806 PrintIsolate(isolate(),
807 "compaction-selection-page: space=%s free_bytes_page=%zu "
808 "fragmentation_limit_kb=%zu "
809 "fragmentation_limit_percent=%d sum_compaction_kb=%zu "
810 "compaction_limit_kb=%zu\n",
811 space->name(), (area_size - live_bytes) / KB,
812 free_bytes_threshold / KB, target_fragmentation_percent,
813 total_live_bytes / KB, max_evacuated_bytes / KB);
814 }
815 }
816 // How many pages we will allocated for the evacuated objects
817 // in the worst case: ceil(total_live_bytes / area_size)
818 int estimated_new_pages =
819 static_cast<int>((total_live_bytes + area_size - 1) / area_size);
820 DCHECK_LE(estimated_new_pages, candidate_count)((void) 0);
821 int estimated_released_pages = candidate_count - estimated_new_pages;
822 // Avoid (compact -> expand) cycles.
823 if ((estimated_released_pages == 0) && !FLAG_always_compact) {
824 candidate_count = 0;
825 }
826 for (int i = 0; i < candidate_count; i++) {
827 AddEvacuationCandidate(pages[i].second);
828 }
829 }
830
831 if (FLAG_trace_fragmentation) {
832 PrintIsolate(isolate(),
833 "compaction-selection: space=%s reduce_memory=%d pages=%d "
834 "total_live_bytes=%zu\n",
835 space->name(), reduce_memory, candidate_count,
836 total_live_bytes / KB);
837 }
838}
839
840void MarkCompactCollector::AbortCompaction() {
841 if (compacting_) {
842 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::ClearAll(heap());
843 for (Page* p : evacuation_candidates_) {
844 p->ClearEvacuationCandidate();
845 }
846 compacting_ = false;
847 evacuation_candidates_.clear();
848 }
849 DCHECK(evacuation_candidates_.empty())((void) 0);
850}
851
852void MarkCompactCollector::Prepare() {
853 was_marked_incrementally_ = heap()->incremental_marking()->IsMarking();
854
855#ifdef DEBUG
856 DCHECK(state_ == IDLE)((void) 0);
857 state_ = PREPARE_GC;
858#endif
859
860 DCHECK(!FLAG_never_compact || !FLAG_always_compact)((void) 0);
861
862 // Instead of waiting we could also abort the sweeper threads here.
863 EnsureSweepingCompleted();
864
865 {
866 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_COMPLETE_SWEEP_ARRAY_BUFFERS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic867 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic867
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic867
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer867
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867)
) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer867
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
867 GCTracer::Scope::MC_COMPLETE_SWEEP_ARRAY_BUFFERS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_COMPLETE_SWEEP_ARRAY_BUFFERS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic867 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic867
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic867
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer867
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867)
) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer867
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled867, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
868 heap_->array_buffer_sweeper()->EnsureFinished();
869 }
870
871 if (heap()->incremental_marking()->IsSweeping()) {
872 heap()->incremental_marking()->Stop();
873 }
874
875 if (!was_marked_incrementally_) {
876 {
877 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_PROLOGUE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_PROLOGUE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic877 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic877
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic877
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer877
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877)
) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer877
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled877, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
878 heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->TracePrologue(
879 heap_->flags_for_embedder_tracer());
880 }
881 if (!FLAG_never_compact) {
882 StartCompaction();
883 }
884 StartMarking();
885 }
886
887 PagedSpaceIterator spaces(heap());
888 for (PagedSpace* space = spaces.Next(); space != nullptr;
889 space = spaces.Next()) {
890 space->PrepareForMarkCompact();
891 }
892
893 if (FLAG_local_heaps) {
894 // Fill and reset all background thread LABs
895 heap_->safepoint()->IterateLocalHeaps(
896 [](LocalHeap* local_heap) { local_heap->FreeLinearAllocationArea(); });
897 }
898}
899
900void MarkCompactCollector::FinishConcurrentMarking(
901 ConcurrentMarking::StopRequest stop_request) {
902 // FinishConcurrentMarking is called for both, concurrent and parallel,
903 // marking. It is safe to call this function when tasks are already finished.
904 if (FLAG_parallel_marking || FLAG_concurrent_marking) {
905 heap()->concurrent_marking()->Stop(stop_request);
906 heap()->concurrent_marking()->FlushMemoryChunkData(
907 non_atomic_marking_state());
908 heap()->concurrent_marking()->FlushNativeContexts(&native_context_stats_);
909 }
910}
911
912void MarkCompactCollector::VerifyMarking() {
913 CHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(local_marking_worklists()->
IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
914 DCHECK(heap_->incremental_marking()->IsStopped())((void) 0);
915#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
916 if (FLAG_verify_heap) {
917 FullMarkingVerifier verifier(heap());
918 verifier.Run();
919 }
920#endif
921#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
922 if (FLAG_verify_heap) {
923 heap()->old_space()->VerifyLiveBytes();
924 heap()->map_space()->VerifyLiveBytes();
925 heap()->code_space()->VerifyLiveBytes();
926 }
927#endif
928}
929
930void MarkCompactCollector::Finish() {
931 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_FINISH)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_FINISH); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic931
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic931
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic931
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer931
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931)
) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer931
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled931, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
932
933 SweepArrayBufferExtensions();
934
935#ifdef DEBUG
936 heap()->VerifyCountersBeforeConcurrentSweeping();
937#endif
938
939 marking_visitor_.reset();
940 local_marking_worklists_.reset();
941 marking_worklists_.ReleaseContextWorklists();
942 native_context_stats_.Clear();
943
944 CHECK(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
945 CHECK(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
946 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.Clear();
947
948 sweeper()->StartSweeperTasks();
949 sweeper()->StartIterabilityTasks();
950
951 // Clear the marking state of live large objects.
952 heap_->lo_space()->ClearMarkingStateOfLiveObjects();
953 heap_->code_lo_space()->ClearMarkingStateOfLiveObjects();
954
955#ifdef DEBUG
956 DCHECK(state_ == SWEEP_SPACES || state_ == RELOCATE_OBJECTS)((void) 0);
957 state_ = IDLE;
958#endif
959 heap_->isolate()->inner_pointer_to_code_cache()->Flush();
960
961 // The stub caches are not traversed during GC; clear them to force
962 // their lazy re-initialization. This must be done after the
963 // GC, because it relies on the new address of certain old space
964 // objects (empty string, illegal builtin).
965 isolate()->load_stub_cache()->Clear();
966 isolate()->store_stub_cache()->Clear();
967
968 if (have_code_to_deoptimize_) {
969 // Some code objects were marked for deoptimization during the GC.
970 Deoptimizer::DeoptimizeMarkedCode(isolate());
971 have_code_to_deoptimize_ = false;
972 }
973}
974
975void MarkCompactCollector::SweepArrayBufferExtensions() {
976 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_FINISH_SWEEP_ARRAY_BUFFERS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_FINISH_SWEEP_ARRAY_BUFFERS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic976 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic976
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic976
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer976
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976)
) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer976
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled976, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
977 heap_->array_buffer_sweeper()->RequestSweepFull();
978}
979
980class MarkCompactCollector::RootMarkingVisitor final : public RootVisitor {
981 public:
982 explicit RootMarkingVisitor(MarkCompactCollector* collector)
983 : collector_(collector) {}
984
985 void VisitRootPointer(Root root, const char* description,
986 FullObjectSlot p) final {
987 MarkObjectByPointer(root, p);
988 }
989
990 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
991 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) final {
992 for (FullObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) MarkObjectByPointer(root, p);
993 }
994
995 private:
996 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void MarkObjectByPointer(Root root, FullObjectSlot p) {
997 if (!(*p).IsHeapObject()) return;
998
999 collector_->MarkRootObject(root, HeapObject::cast(*p));
1000 }
1001
1002 MarkCompactCollector* const collector_;
1003};
1004
1005// This visitor is used to visit the body of special objects held alive by
1006// other roots.
1007//
1008// It is currently used for
1009// - Code held alive by the top optimized frame. This code cannot be deoptimized
1010// and thus have to be kept alive in an isolate way, i.e., it should not keep
1011// alive other code objects reachable through the weak list but they should
1012// keep alive its embedded pointers (which would otherwise be dropped).
1013// - Prefix of the string table.
1014class MarkCompactCollector::CustomRootBodyMarkingVisitor final
1015 : public ObjectVisitor {
1016 public:
1017 explicit CustomRootBodyMarkingVisitor(MarkCompactCollector* collector)
1018 : collector_(collector) {}
1019
1020 void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot p) final {
1021 MarkObject(host, *p);
1022 }
1023
1024 void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot start, ObjectSlot end) final {
1025 for (ObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
1026 DCHECK(!HasWeakHeapObjectTag(*p))((void) 0);
1027 MarkObject(host, *p);
1028 }
1029 }
1030
1031 void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot start,
1032 MaybeObjectSlot end) final {
1033 // At the moment, custom roots cannot contain weak pointers.
1034 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1035 }
1036
1037 // VisitEmbedderPointer is defined by ObjectVisitor to call VisitPointers.
1038 void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
1039 Code target = Code::GetCodeFromTargetAddress(rinfo->target_address());
1040 MarkObject(host, target);
1041 }
1042 void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
1043 MarkObject(host, rinfo->target_object());
1044 }
1045
1046 private:
1047 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void MarkObject(HeapObject host, Object object) {
1048 if (!object.IsHeapObject()) return;
1049 collector_->MarkObject(host, HeapObject::cast(object));
1050 }
1051
1052 MarkCompactCollector* const collector_;
1053};
1054
1055class InternalizedStringTableCleaner : public RootVisitor {
1056 public:
1057 explicit InternalizedStringTableCleaner(Heap* heap)
1058 : heap_(heap), pointers_removed_(0) {}
1059
1060 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
1061 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
1062 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1063 }
1064
1065 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
1066 OffHeapObjectSlot start,
1067 OffHeapObjectSlot end) override {
1068 DCHECK_EQ(root, Root::kStringTable)((void) 0);
1069 // Visit all HeapObject pointers in [start, end).
1070 MarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state =
1071 heap_->mark_compact_collector()->non_atomic_marking_state();
1072 Isolate* isolate = heap_->isolate();
1073 for (OffHeapObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
1074 Object o = p.load(isolate);
1075 if (o.IsHeapObject()) {
1076 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(o);
1077 DCHECK(!Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object))((void) 0);
1078 if (marking_state->IsWhite(heap_object)) {
1079 pointers_removed_++;
1080 // Set the entry to the_hole_value (as deleted).
1081 p.store(StringTable::deleted_element());
1082 }
1083 }
1084 }
1085 }
1086
1087 int PointersRemoved() { return pointers_removed_; }
1088
1089 private:
1090 Heap* heap_;
1091 int pointers_removed_;
1092};
1093
1094class ExternalStringTableCleaner : public RootVisitor {
1095 public:
1096 explicit ExternalStringTableCleaner(Heap* heap) : heap_(heap) {}
1097
1098 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
1099 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
1100 // Visit all HeapObject pointers in [start, end).
1101 MarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state =
1102 heap_->mark_compact_collector()->non_atomic_marking_state();
1103 Object the_hole = ReadOnlyRoots(heap_).the_hole_value();
1104 for (FullObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
1105 Object o = *p;
1106 if (o.IsHeapObject()) {
1107 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(o);
1108 if (marking_state->IsWhite(heap_object)) {
1109 if (o.IsExternalString()) {
1110 heap_->FinalizeExternalString(String::cast(o));
1111 } else {
1112 // The original external string may have been internalized.
1113 DCHECK(o.IsThinString())((void) 0);
1114 }
1115 // Set the entry to the_hole_value (as deleted).
1116 p.store(the_hole);
1117 }
1118 }
1119 }
1120 }
1121
1122 private:
1123 Heap* heap_;
1124};
1125
1126// Implementation of WeakObjectRetainer for mark compact GCs. All marked objects
1127// are retained.
1128class MarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer : public WeakObjectRetainer {
1129 public:
1130 explicit MarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer(
1131 MarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state)
1132 : marking_state_(marking_state) {}
1133
1134 Object RetainAs(Object object) override {
1135 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(object);
1136 DCHECK(!marking_state_->IsGrey(heap_object))((void) 0);
1137 if (marking_state_->IsBlack(heap_object)) {
1138 return object;
1139 } else if (object.IsAllocationSite() &&
1140 !(AllocationSite::cast(object).IsZombie())) {
1141 // "dead" AllocationSites need to live long enough for a traversal of new
1142 // space. These sites get a one-time reprieve.
1143
1144 Object nested = object;
1145 while (nested.IsAllocationSite()) {
1146 AllocationSite current_site = AllocationSite::cast(nested);
1147 // MarkZombie will override the nested_site, read it first before
1148 // marking
1149 nested = current_site.nested_site();
1150 current_site.MarkZombie();
1151 marking_state_->WhiteToBlack(current_site);
1152 }
1153
1154 return object;
1155 } else {
1156 return Object();
1157 }
1158 }
1159
1160 private:
1161 MarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state_;
1162};
1163
1164class RecordMigratedSlotVisitor : public ObjectVisitor {
1165 public:
1166 explicit RecordMigratedSlotVisitor(
1167 MarkCompactCollector* collector,
1168 EphemeronRememberedSet* ephemeron_remembered_set)
1169 : collector_(collector),
1170 ephemeron_remembered_set_(ephemeron_remembered_set) {}
1171
1172 inline void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot p) final {
1173 DCHECK(!HasWeakHeapObjectTag(*p))((void) 0);
1174 RecordMigratedSlot(host, MaybeObject::FromObject(*p), p.address());
1175 }
1176
1177 inline void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot p) final {
1178 RecordMigratedSlot(host, *p, p.address());
1179 }
1180
1181 inline void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot start,
1182 ObjectSlot end) final {
1183 while (start < end) {
1184 VisitPointer(host, start);
1185 ++start;
1186 }
1187 }
1188
1189 inline void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot start,
1190 MaybeObjectSlot end) final {
1191 while (start < end) {
1192 VisitPointer(host, start);
1193 ++start;
1194 }
1195 }
1196
1197 inline void VisitEphemeron(HeapObject host, int index, ObjectSlot key,
1198 ObjectSlot value) override {
1199 DCHECK(host.IsEphemeronHashTable())((void) 0);
1200 DCHECK(!Heap::InYoungGeneration(host))((void) 0);
1201
1202 VisitPointer(host, value);
1203
1204 if (ephemeron_remembered_set_ && Heap::InYoungGeneration(*key)) {
1205 auto table = EphemeronHashTable::unchecked_cast(host);
1206 auto insert_result =
1207 ephemeron_remembered_set_->insert({table, std::unordered_set<int>()});
1208 insert_result.first->second.insert(index);
1209 } else {
1210 VisitPointer(host, key);
1211 }
1212 }
1213
1214 inline void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
1215 DCHECK_EQ(host, rinfo->host())((void) 0);
1216 DCHECK(RelocInfo::IsCodeTargetMode(rinfo->rmode()))((void) 0);
1217 Code target = Code::GetCodeFromTargetAddress(rinfo->target_address());
1218 // The target is always in old space, we don't have to record the slot in
1219 // the old-to-new remembered set.
1220 DCHECK(!Heap::InYoungGeneration(target))((void) 0);
1221 collector_->RecordRelocSlot(host, rinfo, target);
1222 }
1223
1224 inline void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
1225 DCHECK_EQ(host, rinfo->host())((void) 0);
1226 DCHECK(RelocInfo::IsEmbeddedObjectMode(rinfo->rmode()))((void) 0);
1227 HeapObject object = HeapObject::cast(rinfo->target_object());
1228 GenerationalBarrierForCode(host, rinfo, object);
1229 collector_->RecordRelocSlot(host, rinfo, object);
1230 }
1231
1232 // Entries that are skipped for recording.
1233 inline void VisitExternalReference(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {}
1234 inline void VisitExternalReference(Foreign host, Address* p) final {}
1235 inline void VisitRuntimeEntry(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {}
1236 inline void VisitInternalReference(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {}
1237
1238 virtual void MarkArrayBufferExtensionPromoted(HeapObject object) {}
1239
1240 protected:
1241 inline virtual void RecordMigratedSlot(HeapObject host, MaybeObject value,
1242 Address slot) {
1243 if (value->IsStrongOrWeak()) {
1244 BasicMemoryChunk* p = BasicMemoryChunk::FromAddress(value.ptr());
1245 if (p->InYoungGeneration()) {
1246 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
1247 p->IsToPage(),((void) 0)
1248 p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION) || p->IsLargePage())((void) 0);
1249
1250 MemoryChunk* chunk = MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(host);
1251 DCHECK(chunk->SweepingDone())((void) 0);
1252 DCHECK_NULL(chunk->sweeping_slot_set<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>())((void) 0);
1253 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::Insert<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(chunk, slot);
1254 } else if (p->IsEvacuationCandidate()) {
1255 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::Insert<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(
1256 MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(host), slot);
1257 }
1258 }
1259 }
1260
1261 MarkCompactCollector* collector_;
1262 EphemeronRememberedSet* ephemeron_remembered_set_;
1263};
1264
1265class MigrationObserver {
1266 public:
1267 explicit MigrationObserver(Heap* heap) : heap_(heap) {}
1268
1269 virtual ~MigrationObserver() = default;
1270 virtual void Move(AllocationSpace dest, HeapObject src, HeapObject dst,
1271 int size) = 0;
1272
1273 protected:
1274 Heap* heap_;
1275};
1276
1277class ProfilingMigrationObserver final : public MigrationObserver {
1278 public:
1279 explicit ProfilingMigrationObserver(Heap* heap) : MigrationObserver(heap) {}
1280
1281 inline void Move(AllocationSpace dest, HeapObject src, HeapObject dst,
1282 int size) final {
1283 if (dest == CODE_SPACE || (dest == OLD_SPACE && dst.IsBytecodeArray())) {
1284 PROFILE(heap_->isolate(),(heap_->isolate())->code_event_dispatcher()->CodeMoveEvent
(AbstractCode::cast(src), AbstractCode::cast(dst));
1285 CodeMoveEvent(AbstractCode::cast(src), AbstractCode::cast(dst)))(heap_->isolate())->code_event_dispatcher()->CodeMoveEvent
(AbstractCode::cast(src), AbstractCode::cast(dst));;
1286 }
1287 heap_->OnMoveEvent(dst, src, size);
1288 }
1289};
1290
1291class HeapObjectVisitor {
1292 public:
1293 virtual ~HeapObjectVisitor() = default;
1294 virtual bool Visit(HeapObject object, int size) = 0;
1295};
1296
1297class EvacuateVisitorBase : public HeapObjectVisitor {
1298 public:
1299 void AddObserver(MigrationObserver* observer) {
1300 migration_function_ = RawMigrateObject<MigrationMode::kObserved>;
1301 observers_.push_back(observer);
1302 }
1303
1304 protected:
1305 enum MigrationMode { kFast, kObserved };
1306
1307 using MigrateFunction = void (*)(EvacuateVisitorBase* base, HeapObject dst,
1308 HeapObject src, int size,
1309 AllocationSpace dest);
1310
1311 template <MigrationMode mode>
1312 static void RawMigrateObject(EvacuateVisitorBase* base, HeapObject dst,
1313 HeapObject src, int size, AllocationSpace dest) {
1314 Address dst_addr = dst.address();
1315 Address src_addr = src.address();
1316 DCHECK(base->heap_->AllowedToBeMigrated(src.map(), src, dest))((void) 0);
1317 DCHECK_NE(dest, LO_SPACE)((void) 0);
1318 DCHECK_NE(dest, CODE_LO_SPACE)((void) 0);
1319 if (dest == OLD_SPACE) {
1320 DCHECK_OBJECT_SIZE(size)((void) 0);
1321 DCHECK(IsAligned(size, kTaggedSize))((void) 0);
1322 base->heap_->CopyBlock(dst_addr, src_addr, size);
1323 if (mode != MigrationMode::kFast)
1324 base->ExecuteMigrationObservers(dest, src, dst, size);
1325 dst.IterateBodyFast(dst.map(), size, base->record_visitor_);
1326 if (V8_UNLIKELY(FLAG_minor_mc)(__builtin_expect(!!(FLAG_minor_mc), 0))) {
1327 base->record_visitor_->MarkArrayBufferExtensionPromoted(dst);
1328 }
1329 } else if (dest == CODE_SPACE) {
1330 DCHECK_CODEOBJECT_SIZE(size, base->heap_->code_space())((void) 0);
1331 base->heap_->CopyBlock(dst_addr, src_addr, size);
1332 Code::cast(dst).Relocate(dst_addr - src_addr);
1333 if (mode != MigrationMode::kFast)
1334 base->ExecuteMigrationObservers(dest, src, dst, size);
1335 dst.IterateBodyFast(dst.map(), size, base->record_visitor_);
1336 } else {
1337 DCHECK_OBJECT_SIZE(size)((void) 0);
1338 DCHECK(dest == NEW_SPACE)((void) 0);
1339 base->heap_->CopyBlock(dst_addr, src_addr, size);
1340 if (mode != MigrationMode::kFast)
1341 base->ExecuteMigrationObservers(dest, src, dst, size);
1342 }
1343 src.set_map_word(MapWord::FromForwardingAddress(dst));
1344 }
1345
1346 EvacuateVisitorBase(Heap* heap, EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator,
1347 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor)
1348 : heap_(heap),
1349 local_allocator_(local_allocator),
1350 record_visitor_(record_visitor) {
1351 migration_function_ = RawMigrateObject<MigrationMode::kFast>;
1352 }
1353
1354 inline bool TryEvacuateObject(AllocationSpace target_space, HeapObject object,
1355 int size, HeapObject* target_object) {
1356#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
1357 if (FLAG_verify_heap && AbortCompactionForTesting(object)) return false;
1358#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
1359 AllocationAlignment alignment = HeapObject::RequiredAlignment(object.map());
1360 AllocationResult allocation = local_allocator_->Allocate(
1361 target_space, size, AllocationOrigin::kGC, alignment);
1362 if (allocation.To(target_object)) {
1363 MigrateObject(*target_object, object, size, target_space);
1364 if (target_space == CODE_SPACE)
1365 MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(*target_object)
1366 ->GetCodeObjectRegistry()
1367 ->RegisterNewlyAllocatedCodeObject((*target_object).address());
1368 return true;
1369 }
1370 return false;
1371 }
1372
1373 inline void ExecuteMigrationObservers(AllocationSpace dest, HeapObject src,
1374 HeapObject dst, int size) {
1375 for (MigrationObserver* obs : observers_) {
1376 obs->Move(dest, src, dst, size);
1377 }
1378 }
1379
1380 inline void MigrateObject(HeapObject dst, HeapObject src, int size,
1381 AllocationSpace dest) {
1382 migration_function_(this, dst, src, size, dest);
1383 }
1384
1385#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
1386 bool AbortCompactionForTesting(HeapObject object) {
1387 if (FLAG_stress_compaction) {
1388 const uintptr_t mask = static_cast<uintptr_t>(FLAG_random_seed) &
1389 kPageAlignmentMask & ~kObjectAlignmentMask;
1390 if ((object.ptr() & kPageAlignmentMask) == mask) {
1391 Page* page = Page::FromHeapObject(object);
1392 if (page->IsFlagSet(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED_FOR_TESTING)) {
1393 page->ClearFlag(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED_FOR_TESTING);
1394 } else {
1395 page->SetFlag(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED_FOR_TESTING);
1396 return true;
1397 }
1398 }
1399 }
1400 return false;
1401 }
1402#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
1403
1404 Heap* heap_;
1405 EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator_;
1406 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor_;
1407 std::vector<MigrationObserver*> observers_;
1408 MigrateFunction migration_function_;
1409};
1410
1411class EvacuateNewSpaceVisitor final : public EvacuateVisitorBase {
1412 public:
1413 explicit EvacuateNewSpaceVisitor(
1414 Heap* heap, EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator,
1415 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor,
1416 Heap::PretenuringFeedbackMap* local_pretenuring_feedback,
1417 bool always_promote_young)
1418 : EvacuateVisitorBase(heap, local_allocator, record_visitor),
1419 buffer_(LocalAllocationBuffer::InvalidBuffer()),
1420 promoted_size_(0),
1421 semispace_copied_size_(0),
1422 local_pretenuring_feedback_(local_pretenuring_feedback),
1423 is_incremental_marking_(heap->incremental_marking()->IsMarking()),
1424 always_promote_young_(always_promote_young) {}
1425
1426 inline bool Visit(HeapObject object, int size) override {
1427 if (TryEvacuateWithoutCopy(object)) return true;
1428 HeapObject target_object;
1429
1430 if (always_promote_young_) {
1431 heap_->UpdateAllocationSite(object.map(), object,
1432 local_pretenuring_feedback_);
1433
1434 if (!TryEvacuateObject(OLD_SPACE, object, size, &target_object)) {
1435 heap_->FatalProcessOutOfMemory(
1436 "MarkCompactCollector: young object promotion failed");
1437 }
1438
1439 promoted_size_ += size;
1440 return true;
1441 }
1442
1443 if (heap_->ShouldBePromoted(object.address()) &&
1444 TryEvacuateObject(OLD_SPACE, object, size, &target_object)) {
1445 promoted_size_ += size;
1446 return true;
1447 }
1448
1449 heap_->UpdateAllocationSite(object.map(), object,
1450 local_pretenuring_feedback_);
1451
1452 HeapObject target;
1453 AllocationSpace space = AllocateTargetObject(object, size, &target);
1454 MigrateObject(HeapObject::cast(target), object, size, space);
1455 semispace_copied_size_ += size;
1456 return true;
1457 }
1458
1459 intptr_t promoted_size() { return promoted_size_; }
1460 intptr_t semispace_copied_size() { return semispace_copied_size_; }
1461
1462 private:
1463 inline bool TryEvacuateWithoutCopy(HeapObject object) {
1464 if (is_incremental_marking_) return false;
1465
1466 Map map = object.map();
1467
1468 // Some objects can be evacuated without creating a copy.
1469 if (map.visitor_id() == kVisitThinString) {
1470 HeapObject actual = ThinString::cast(object).unchecked_actual();
1471 if (MarkCompactCollector::IsOnEvacuationCandidate(actual)) return false;
1472 object.set_map_word(MapWord::FromForwardingAddress(actual));
1473 return true;
1474 }
1475 // TODO(mlippautz): Handle ConsString.
1476
1477 return false;
1478 }
1479
1480 inline AllocationSpace AllocateTargetObject(HeapObject old_object, int size,
1481 HeapObject* target_object) {
1482 AllocationAlignment alignment =
1483 HeapObject::RequiredAlignment(old_object.map());
1484 AllocationSpace space_allocated_in = NEW_SPACE;
1485 AllocationResult allocation = local_allocator_->Allocate(
1486 NEW_SPACE, size, AllocationOrigin::kGC, alignment);
1487 if (allocation.IsRetry()) {
1488 allocation = AllocateInOldSpace(size, alignment);
1489 space_allocated_in = OLD_SPACE;
1490 }
1491 bool ok = allocation.To(target_object);
1492 DCHECK(ok)((void) 0);
1493 USE(ok)do { ::v8::base::Use unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro[]{ok}; (void
)unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro; } while (false);
1494 return space_allocated_in;
1495 }
1496
1497 inline AllocationResult AllocateInOldSpace(int size_in_bytes,
1498 AllocationAlignment alignment) {
1499 AllocationResult allocation = local_allocator_->Allocate(
1500 OLD_SPACE, size_in_bytes, AllocationOrigin::kGC, alignment);
1501 if (allocation.IsRetry()) {
1502 heap_->FatalProcessOutOfMemory(
1503 "MarkCompactCollector: semi-space copy, fallback in old gen");
1504 }
1505 return allocation;
1506 }
1507
1508 LocalAllocationBuffer buffer_;
1509 intptr_t promoted_size_;
1510 intptr_t semispace_copied_size_;
1511 Heap::PretenuringFeedbackMap* local_pretenuring_feedback_;
1512 bool is_incremental_marking_;
1513 bool always_promote_young_;
1514};
1515
1516template <PageEvacuationMode mode>
1517class EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor final : public HeapObjectVisitor {
1518 public:
1519 explicit EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor(
1520 Heap* heap, RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor,
1521 Heap::PretenuringFeedbackMap* local_pretenuring_feedback)
1522 : heap_(heap),
1523 record_visitor_(record_visitor),
1524 moved_bytes_(0),
1525 local_pretenuring_feedback_(local_pretenuring_feedback) {}
1526
1527 static void Move(Page* page) {
1528 switch (mode) {
1529 case NEW_TO_NEW:
1530 page->heap()->new_space()->MovePageFromSpaceToSpace(page);
1531 page->SetFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION);
1532 break;
1533 case NEW_TO_OLD: {
1534 page->heap()->new_space()->from_space().RemovePage(page);
1535 Page* new_page = Page::ConvertNewToOld(page);
1536 DCHECK(!new_page->InYoungGeneration())((void) 0);
1537 new_page->SetFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
1538 break;
1539 }
1540 }
1541 }
1542
1543 inline bool Visit(HeapObject object, int size) override {
1544 if (mode == NEW_TO_NEW) {
1545 heap_->UpdateAllocationSite(object.map(), object,
1546 local_pretenuring_feedback_);
1547 } else if (mode == NEW_TO_OLD) {
1548 object.IterateBodyFast(record_visitor_);
1549 if (V8_UNLIKELY(FLAG_minor_mc)(__builtin_expect(!!(FLAG_minor_mc), 0))) {
1550 record_visitor_->MarkArrayBufferExtensionPromoted(object);
1551 }
1552 }
1553 return true;
1554 }
1555
1556 intptr_t moved_bytes() { return moved_bytes_; }
1557 void account_moved_bytes(intptr_t bytes) { moved_bytes_ += bytes; }
1558
1559 private:
1560 Heap* heap_;
1561 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor_;
1562 intptr_t moved_bytes_;
1563 Heap::PretenuringFeedbackMap* local_pretenuring_feedback_;
1564};
1565
1566class EvacuateOldSpaceVisitor final : public EvacuateVisitorBase {
1567 public:
1568 EvacuateOldSpaceVisitor(Heap* heap, EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator,
1569 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor)
1570 : EvacuateVisitorBase(heap, local_allocator, record_visitor) {}
1571
1572 inline bool Visit(HeapObject object, int size) override {
1573 HeapObject target_object;
1574 if (TryEvacuateObject(Page::FromHeapObject(object)->owner_identity(),
1575 object, size, &target_object)) {
1576 DCHECK(object.map_word().IsForwardingAddress())((void) 0);
1577 return true;
1578 }
1579 return false;
1580 }
1581};
1582
1583class EvacuateRecordOnlyVisitor final : public HeapObjectVisitor {
1584 public:
1585 explicit EvacuateRecordOnlyVisitor(Heap* heap) : heap_(heap) {}
1586
1587 inline bool Visit(HeapObject object, int size) override {
1588 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor visitor(heap_->mark_compact_collector(),
1589 &heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_);
1590 object.IterateBodyFast(&visitor);
1591 return true;
1592 }
1593
1594 private:
1595 Heap* heap_;
1596};
1597
1598bool MarkCompactCollector::IsUnmarkedHeapObject(Heap* heap, FullObjectSlot p) {
1599 Object o = *p;
1600 if (!o.IsHeapObject()) return false;
1601 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(o);
1602 return heap->mark_compact_collector()->non_atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(
1603 heap_object);
1604}
1605
1606void MarkCompactCollector::MarkRoots(RootVisitor* root_visitor,
1607 ObjectVisitor* custom_root_body_visitor) {
1608 // Mark the heap roots including global variables, stack variables,
1609 // etc., and all objects reachable from them.
1610 heap()->IterateRoots(root_visitor, base::EnumSet<SkipRoot>{SkipRoot::kWeak});
1611
1612 // Custom marking for top optimized frame.
1613 ProcessTopOptimizedFrame(custom_root_body_visitor);
1614}
1615
1616void MarkCompactCollector::VisitObject(HeapObject obj) {
1617 marking_visitor_->Visit(obj.map(), obj);
1618}
1619
1620void MarkCompactCollector::RevisitObject(HeapObject obj) {
1621 DCHECK(marking_state()->IsBlack(obj))((void) 0);
1622 DCHECK_IMPLIES(MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(obj)->IsFlagSet(((void) 0)
1623 MemoryChunk::HAS_PROGRESS_BAR),((void) 0)
1624 0u == MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(obj)->ProgressBar())((void) 0);
1625 MarkingVisitor::RevisitScope revisit(marking_visitor_.get());
1626 marking_visitor_->Visit(obj.map(), obj);
1627}
1628
1629void MarkCompactCollector::MarkDescriptorArrayFromWriteBarrier(
1630 HeapObject host, DescriptorArray descriptors,
1631 int number_of_own_descriptors) {
1632 marking_visitor_->MarkDescriptorArrayFromWriteBarrier(
1633 host, descriptors, number_of_own_descriptors);
1634}
1635
1636void MarkCompactCollector::ProcessEphemeronsUntilFixpoint() {
1637 bool work_to_do = true;
1638 int iterations = 0;
1639 int max_iterations = FLAG_ephemeron_fixpoint_iterations;
1640
1641 while (work_to_do) {
1642 PerformWrapperTracing();
1643
1644 if (iterations >= max_iterations) {
1645 // Give up fixpoint iteration and switch to linear algorithm.
1646 ProcessEphemeronsLinear();
1647 break;
1648 }
1649
1650 // Move ephemerons from next_ephemerons into current_ephemerons to
1651 // drain them in this iteration.
1652 weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.Swap(weak_objects_.next_ephemerons);
1653 heap()->concurrent_marking()->set_ephemeron_marked(false);
1654
1655 {
1656 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1657 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1657
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1657
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1657
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1657
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
1657 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1657 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1657
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1657
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1657
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1657
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1657, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1658
1659 if (FLAG_parallel_marking) {
1660 heap_->concurrent_marking()->RescheduleTasksIfNeeded();
1661 }
1662
1663 work_to_do = ProcessEphemerons();
1664 FinishConcurrentMarking(
1665 ConcurrentMarking::StopRequest::COMPLETE_ONGOING_TASKS);
1666 }
1667
1668 CHECK(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1669 CHECK(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1670
1671 work_to_do = work_to_do || !local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty() ||
1672 heap()->concurrent_marking()->ephemeron_marked() ||
1673 !local_marking_worklists()->IsEmbedderEmpty() ||
1674 !heap()->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->IsRemoteTracingDone();
1675 ++iterations;
1676 }
1677
1678 CHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(local_marking_worklists()->
IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1679 CHECK(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1680 CHECK(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1681}
1682
1683bool MarkCompactCollector::ProcessEphemerons() {
1684 Ephemeron ephemeron;
1685 bool ephemeron_marked = false;
1686
1687 // Drain current_ephemerons and push ephemerons where key and value are still
1688 // unreachable into next_ephemerons.
1689 while (weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &ephemeron)) {
1690 if (ProcessEphemeron(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value)) {
1691 ephemeron_marked = true;
1692 }
1693 }
1694
1695 // Drain marking worklist and push discovered ephemerons into
1696 // discovered_ephemerons.
1697 DrainMarkingWorklist();
1698
1699 // Drain discovered_ephemerons (filled in the drain MarkingWorklist-phase
1700 // before) and push ephemerons where key and value are still unreachable into
1701 // next_ephemerons.
1702 while (weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &ephemeron)) {
1703 if (ProcessEphemeron(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value)) {
1704 ephemeron_marked = true;
1705 }
1706 }
1707
1708 // Flush local ephemerons for main task to global pool.
1709 weak_objects_.ephemeron_hash_tables.FlushToGlobal(kMainThreadTask);
1710 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.FlushToGlobal(kMainThreadTask);
1711
1712 return ephemeron_marked;
1713}
1714
1715void MarkCompactCollector::ProcessEphemeronsLinear() {
1716 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_LINEAR); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1717 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1717
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1717
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1717
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1717
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
1717 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_LINEAR)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_LINEAR); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1717 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1717
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1717
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1717
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1717
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1717, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1718 CHECK(heap()->concurrent_marking()->IsStopped())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(heap()->concurrent_marking
()->IsStopped())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "heap()->concurrent_marking()->IsStopped()"
); } } while (false);
1719 std::unordered_multimap<HeapObject, HeapObject, Object::Hasher> key_to_values;
1720 Ephemeron ephemeron;
1721
1722 DCHECK(weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
1723 weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.Swap(weak_objects_.next_ephemerons);
1724
1725 while (weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &ephemeron)) {
1726 ProcessEphemeron(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value);
1727
1728 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(ephemeron.value)) {
1729 key_to_values.insert(std::make_pair(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value));
1730 }
1731 }
1732
1733 ephemeron_marking_.newly_discovered_limit = key_to_values.size();
1734 bool work_to_do = true;
1735
1736 while (work_to_do) {
1737 PerformWrapperTracing();
1738
1739 ResetNewlyDiscovered();
1740 ephemeron_marking_.newly_discovered_limit = key_to_values.size();
1741
1742 {
1743 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1744 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1744
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1744
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1744
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1744
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
1744 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON_MARKING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1744 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1744
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1744
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1744
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1744
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1744, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1745 // Drain marking worklist and push all discovered objects into
1746 // newly_discovered.
1747 ProcessMarkingWorklist<
1748 MarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklistProcessingMode::
1749 kTrackNewlyDiscoveredObjects>(0);
1750 }
1751
1752 while (
1753 weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &ephemeron)) {
1754 ProcessEphemeron(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value);
1755
1756 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(ephemeron.value)) {
1757 key_to_values.insert(std::make_pair(ephemeron.key, ephemeron.value));
1758 }
1759 }
1760
1761 if (ephemeron_marking_.newly_discovered_overflowed) {
1762 // If newly_discovered was overflowed just visit all ephemerons in
1763 // next_ephemerons.
1764 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.Iterate([&](Ephemeron ephemeron) {
1765 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(ephemeron.key) &&
1766 non_atomic_marking_state()->WhiteToGrey(ephemeron.value)) {
1767 local_marking_worklists()->Push(ephemeron.value);
1768 }
1769 });
1770
1771 } else {
1772 // This is the good case: newly_discovered stores all discovered
1773 // objects. Now use key_to_values to see if discovered objects keep more
1774 // objects alive due to ephemeron semantics.
1775 for (HeapObject object : ephemeron_marking_.newly_discovered) {
1776 auto range = key_to_values.equal_range(object);
1777 for (auto it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it) {
1778 HeapObject value = it->second;
1779 MarkObject(object, value);
1780 }
1781 }
1782 }
1783
1784 // Do NOT drain marking worklist here, otherwise the current checks
1785 // for work_to_do are not sufficient for determining if another iteration
1786 // is necessary.
1787
1788 work_to_do = !local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty() ||
1789 !local_marking_worklists()->IsEmbedderEmpty() ||
1790 !heap()->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->IsRemoteTracingDone();
1791 CHECK(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons
.IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1792 }
1793
1794 ResetNewlyDiscovered();
1795 ephemeron_marking_.newly_discovered.shrink_to_fit();
1796
1797 CHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(local_marking_worklists()->
IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1798}
1799
1800void MarkCompactCollector::PerformWrapperTracing() {
1801 if (heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->InUse()) {
1802 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_TRACING)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_TRACING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1802 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1802
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1802
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1802
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1802
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1802, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1803 {
1804 LocalEmbedderHeapTracer::ProcessingScope scope(
1805 heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer());
1806 HeapObject object;
1807 while (local_marking_worklists()->PopEmbedder(&object)) {
1808 scope.TracePossibleWrapper(JSObject::cast(object));
1809 }
1810 }
1811 heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->Trace(
1812 std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
1813 }
1814}
1815
1816void MarkCompactCollector::DrainMarkingWorklist() { ProcessMarkingWorklist(0); }
1817
1818template <MarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklistProcessingMode mode>
1819size_t MarkCompactCollector::ProcessMarkingWorklist(size_t bytes_to_process) {
1820 HeapObject object;
1821 size_t bytes_processed = 0;
1822 bool is_per_context_mode = local_marking_worklists()->IsPerContextMode();
1823 Isolate* isolate = heap()->isolate();
1824 while (local_marking_worklists()->Pop(&object) ||
1825 local_marking_worklists()->PopOnHold(&object)) {
1826 // Left trimming may result in grey or black filler objects on the marking
1827 // worklist. Ignore these objects.
1828 if (object.IsFreeSpaceOrFiller()) {
1829 // Due to copying mark bits and the fact that grey and black have their
1830 // first bit set, one word fillers are always black.
1831 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
1832 object.map() == ReadOnlyRoots(heap()).one_pointer_filler_map(),((void) 0)
1833 marking_state()->IsBlack(object))((void) 0);
1834 // Other fillers may be black or grey depending on the color of the object
1835 // that was trimmed.
1836 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
1837 object.map() != ReadOnlyRoots(heap()).one_pointer_filler_map(),((void) 0)
1838 marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(object))((void) 0);
1839 continue;
1840 }
1841 DCHECK(object.IsHeapObject())((void) 0);
1842 DCHECK(heap()->Contains(object))((void) 0);
1843 DCHECK(!(marking_state()->IsWhite(object)))((void) 0);
1844 if (mode == MarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklistProcessingMode::
1845 kTrackNewlyDiscoveredObjects) {
1846 AddNewlyDiscovered(object);
1847 }
1848 Map map = object.map(isolate);
1849 if (is_per_context_mode) {
1850 Address context;
1851 if (native_context_inferrer_.Infer(isolate, map, object, &context)) {
1852 local_marking_worklists()->SwitchToContext(context);
1853 }
1854 }
1855 size_t visited_size = marking_visitor_->Visit(map, object);
1856 if (is_per_context_mode) {
1857 native_context_stats_.IncrementSize(local_marking_worklists()->Context(),
1858 map, object, visited_size);
1859 }
1860 bytes_processed += visited_size;
1861 if (bytes_to_process && bytes_processed >= bytes_to_process) {
1862 break;
1863 }
1864 }
1865 return bytes_processed;
1866}
1867
1868// Generate definitions for use in other files.
1869template size_t MarkCompactCollector::ProcessMarkingWorklist<
1870 MarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklistProcessingMode::kDefault>(
1871 size_t bytes_to_process);
1872template size_t MarkCompactCollector::ProcessMarkingWorklist<
1873 MarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklistProcessingMode::
1874 kTrackNewlyDiscoveredObjects>(size_t bytes_to_process);
1875
1876bool MarkCompactCollector::ProcessEphemeron(HeapObject key, HeapObject value) {
1877 if (marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key)) {
1878 if (marking_state()->WhiteToGrey(value)) {
1879 local_marking_worklists()->Push(value);
1880 return true;
1881 }
1882
1883 } else if (marking_state()->IsWhite(value)) {
1884 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.Push(kMainThreadTask, Ephemeron{key, value});
1885 }
1886
1887 return false;
1888}
1889
1890void MarkCompactCollector::ProcessEphemeronMarking() {
1891 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
1892
1893 // Incremental marking might leave ephemerons in main task's local
1894 // buffer, flush it into global pool.
1895 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.FlushToGlobal(kMainThreadTask);
1896
1897 ProcessEphemeronsUntilFixpoint();
1898
1899 CHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(local_marking_worklists()->
IsEmpty())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty()"
); } } while (false);
1900 CHECK(heap()->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->IsRemoteTracingDone())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(heap()->local_embedder_heap_tracer
()->IsRemoteTracingDone())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "heap()->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->IsRemoteTracingDone()"
); } } while (false);
1901}
1902
1903void MarkCompactCollector::ProcessTopOptimizedFrame(ObjectVisitor* visitor) {
1904 for (StackFrameIterator it(isolate(), isolate()->thread_local_top());
1905 !it.done(); it.Advance()) {
1906 if (it.frame()->type() == StackFrame::INTERPRETED) {
1907 return;
1908 }
1909 if (it.frame()->type() == StackFrame::OPTIMIZED) {
1910 Code code = it.frame()->LookupCode();
1911 if (!code.CanDeoptAt(it.frame()->pc())) {
1912 Code::BodyDescriptor::IterateBody(code.map(), code, visitor);
1913 }
1914 return;
1915 }
1916 }
1917}
1918
1919void MarkCompactCollector::RecordObjectStats() {
1920 if (V8_UNLIKELY(TracingFlags::is_gc_stats_enabled())(__builtin_expect(!!(TracingFlags::is_gc_stats_enabled()), 0)
)) {
1921 heap()->CreateObjectStats();
1922 ObjectStatsCollector collector(heap(), heap()->live_object_stats_.get(),
1923 heap()->dead_object_stats_.get());
1924 collector.Collect();
1925 if (V8_UNLIKELY(TracingFlags::gc_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) &(__builtin_expect(!!(TracingFlags::gc_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed
) & v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_TRACING
), 0))
1926 v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_TRACING)(__builtin_expect(!!(TracingFlags::gc_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed
) & v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_TRACING
), 0))) {
1927 std::stringstream live, dead;
1928 heap()->live_object_stats_->Dump(live);
1929 heap()->dead_object_stats_->Dump(dead);
1930 TRACE_EVENT_INSTANT2(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc_stats"),do { static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1933
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc_stats"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
))); };; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const
v8::base::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('I'), trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
, "V8.GC_Objects_Stats", v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope,
v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (
static_cast<unsigned int>(0)) | (static_cast<unsigned
char>(2 << 2)), "live", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(live.str().c_str()), "dead", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(dead.str().c_str())); } } while (false)
1931 "V8.GC_Objects_Stats", TRACE_EVENT_SCOPE_THREAD,do { static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1933
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc_stats"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
))); };; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const
v8::base::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('I'), trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
, "V8.GC_Objects_Stats", v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope,
v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (
static_cast<unsigned int>(0)) | (static_cast<unsigned
char>(2 << 2)), "live", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(live.str().c_str()), "dead", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(dead.str().c_str())); } } while (false)
1932 "live", TRACE_STR_COPY(live.str().c_str()), "dead",do { static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1933
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc_stats"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
))); };; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const
v8::base::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('I'), trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
, "V8.GC_Objects_Stats", v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope,
v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (
static_cast<unsigned int>(0)) | (static_cast<unsigned
char>(2 << 2)), "live", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(live.str().c_str()), "dead", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(dead.str().c_str())); } } while (false)
1933 TRACE_STR_COPY(dead.str().c_str()))do { static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1933
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc_stats"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1933
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
))); };; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const
v8::base::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('I'), trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1933
, "V8.GC_Objects_Stats", v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope,
v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (
static_cast<unsigned int>(0)) | (static_cast<unsigned
char>(2 << 2)), "live", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(live.str().c_str()), "dead", v8::internal::tracing::TraceStringWithCopy
(dead.str().c_str())); } } while (false);
1934 }
1935 if (FLAG_trace_gc_object_stats) {
1936 heap()->live_object_stats_->PrintJSON("live");
1937 heap()->dead_object_stats_->PrintJSON("dead");
1938 }
1939 heap()->live_object_stats_->CheckpointObjectStats();
1940 heap()->dead_object_stats_->ClearObjectStats();
1941 }
1942}
1943
1944void MarkCompactCollector::MarkLiveObjects() {
1945 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer()
, gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1945
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1945
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1945
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1945
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1945
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1945, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1946 // The recursive GC marker detects when it is nearing stack overflow,
1947 // and switches to a different marking system. JS interrupts interfere
1948 // with the C stack limit check.
1949 PostponeInterruptsScope postpone(isolate());
1950
1951 {
1952 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_FINISH_INCREMENTAL)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_FINISH_INCREMENTAL); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(
heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1952 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1952
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1952
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1952
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1952
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1952, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1953 IncrementalMarking* incremental_marking = heap_->incremental_marking();
1954 if (was_marked_incrementally_) {
1955 incremental_marking->Finalize();
1956 } else {
1957 CHECK(incremental_marking->IsStopped())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(incremental_marking->IsStopped
())), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "incremental_marking->IsStopped()"
); } } while (false);
1958 }
1959 }
1960
1961#ifdef DEBUG
1962 DCHECK(state_ == PREPARE_GC)((void) 0);
1963 state_ = MARK_LIVE_OBJECTS;
1964#endif
1965
1966 heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->EnterFinalPause();
1967
1968 RootMarkingVisitor root_visitor(this);
1969
1970 {
1971 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_ROOTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1971
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1971
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1971
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1971
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1971
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1971, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1972 CustomRootBodyMarkingVisitor custom_root_body_visitor(this);
1973 MarkRoots(&root_visitor, &custom_root_body_visitor);
1974 }
1975
1976 {
1977 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_MAIN)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_MAIN); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic1977
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1977
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1977
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1977
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1977
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1977, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1978 if (FLAG_parallel_marking) {
1979 heap_->concurrent_marking()->RescheduleTasksIfNeeded();
1980 }
1981 DrainMarkingWorklist();
1982
1983 FinishConcurrentMarking(
1984 ConcurrentMarking::StopRequest::COMPLETE_ONGOING_TASKS);
1985 DrainMarkingWorklist();
1986 }
1987
1988 {
1989 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()
->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1989 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1989
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1989
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1989
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1989
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1989, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1990
1991 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
1992
1993 // Mark objects reachable through the embedder heap. This phase is
1994 // opportunistic as it may not discover graphs that are only reachable
1995 // through ephemerons.
1996 {
1997 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_TRACING_CLOSURE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1998 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1998
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1998
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1998
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1998
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
1998 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_TRACING_CLOSURE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_EMBEDDER_TRACING_CLOSURE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic1998 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
