; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1998
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic1998
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer1998
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer1998
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled1998, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
1999 do {
2000 // PerformWrapperTracing() also empties the work items collected by
2001 // concurrent markers. As a result this call needs to happen at least
2002 // once.
2003 PerformWrapperTracing();
2004 DrainMarkingWorklist();
2005 } while (!heap_->local_embedder_heap_tracer()->IsRemoteTracingDone() ||
2006 !local_marking_worklists()->IsEmbedderEmpty());
2007 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmbedderEmpty())((void) 0);
2008 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2009 }
2010
2011 // The objects reachable from the roots are marked, yet unreachable objects
2012 // are unmarked. Mark objects reachable due to embedder heap tracing or
2013 // harmony weak maps.
2014 {
2015 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2016 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2016
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2016
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2016
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2016
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
2016 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_EPHEMERON); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2016 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2016
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2016
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2016
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2016
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2016, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2017 ProcessEphemeronMarking();
2018 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2019 }
2020
2021 // The objects reachable from the roots, weak maps, and embedder heap
2022 // tracing are marked. Objects pointed to only by weak global handles cannot
2023 // be immediately reclaimed. Instead, we have to mark them as pending and
2024 // mark objects reachable from them.
2025 //
2026 // First we identify nonlive weak handles and mark them as pending
2027 // destruction.
2028 {
2029 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_HANDLES); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2030 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2030
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2030
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2030
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2030
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
2030 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_HANDLES)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_HANDLES); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2030 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2030
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2030
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2030
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2030
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2030, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2031 heap()->isolate()->global_handles()->IterateWeakRootsIdentifyFinalizers(
2032 &IsUnmarkedHeapObject);
2033 DrainMarkingWorklist();
2034 }
2035
2036 // Process finalizers, effectively keeping them alive until the next
2037 // garbage collection.
2038 {
2039 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2040 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2040
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2040
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2040
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2040
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
2040 GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_ROOTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_WEAK_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2040 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2040
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2040
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2040
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2040
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2040, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2041 heap()->isolate()->global_handles()->IterateWeakRootsForFinalizers(
2042 &root_visitor);
2043 DrainMarkingWorklist();
2044 }
2045
2046 // Repeat ephemeron processing from the newly marked objects.
2047 {
2048 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_HARMONY)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_MARK_WEAK_CLOSURE_HARMONY); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2048 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2048
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2048
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2048
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2048
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2048, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2049 ProcessEphemeronMarking();
2050 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmbedderEmpty())((void) 0);
2051 DCHECK(local_marking_worklists()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2052 }
2053
2054 {
2055 heap()->isolate()->global_handles()->IterateWeakRootsForPhantomHandles(
2056 &IsUnmarkedHeapObject);
2057 }
2058 }
2059
2060 if (was_marked_incrementally_) {
2061 heap()->marking_barrier()->Deactivate();
2062 }
2063
2064 epoch_++;
2065}
2066
2067void MarkCompactCollector::ClearNonLiveReferences() {
2068 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer(
), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic2068
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2068
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2068
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2068
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2068
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2068, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2069
2070 {
2071 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_STRING_TABLE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_STRING_TABLE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap(
)->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2071 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2071
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2071
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2071
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2071
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2071, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2072
2073 // Prune the string table removing all strings only pointed to by the
2074 // string table. Cannot use string_table() here because the string
2075 // table is marked.
2076 StringTable* string_table = isolate()->string_table();
2077 InternalizedStringTableCleaner internalized_visitor(heap());
2078 string_table->DropOldData();
2079 string_table->IterateElements(&internalized_visitor);
2080 string_table->NotifyElementsRemoved(internalized_visitor.PointersRemoved());
2081
2082 ExternalStringTableCleaner external_visitor(heap());
2083 heap()->external_string_table_.IterateAll(&external_visitor);
2084 heap()->external_string_table_.CleanUpAll();
2085 }
2086
2087 {
2088 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_FLUSHABLE_BYTECODE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_FLUSHABLE_BYTECODE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2088 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2088
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2088
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2088
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2088
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2088, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2089 ClearOldBytecodeCandidates();
2090 }
2091
2092 {
2093 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_FLUSHED_JS_FUNCTIONS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_FLUSHED_JS_FUNCTIONS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2093 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2093
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2093
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2093
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2093
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2093, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2094 ClearFlushedJsFunctions();
2095 }
2096
2097 {
2098 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_WEAK_LISTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_WEAK_LISTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic2098
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2098
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2098
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2098
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2098
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2098, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2099 // Process the weak references.
2100 MarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer mark_compact_object_retainer(
2101 non_atomic_marking_state());
2102 heap()->ProcessAllWeakReferences(&mark_compact_object_retainer);
2103 }
2104
2105 {
2106 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_MAPS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_MAPS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic2106
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2106
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2106
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2106
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2106
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2106, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2107 // ClearFullMapTransitions must be called before weak references are
2108 // cleared.
2109 ClearFullMapTransitions();
2110 }
2111 {
2112 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_WEAK_REFERENCES)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_WEAK_REFERENCES); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2112 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2112
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2112
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2112
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2112
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2112, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2113 ClearWeakReferences();
2114 ClearWeakCollections();
2115 ClearJSWeakRefs();
2116 }
2117
2118 MarkDependentCodeForDeoptimization();
2119
2120 DCHECK(weak_objects_.transition_arrays.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2121 DCHECK(weak_objects_.weak_references.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2122 DCHECK(weak_objects_.weak_objects_in_code.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2123 DCHECK(weak_objects_.js_weak_refs.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2124 DCHECK(weak_objects_.weak_cells.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2125 DCHECK(weak_objects_.bytecode_flushing_candidates.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2126 DCHECK(weak_objects_.flushed_js_functions.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2127}
2128
2129void MarkCompactCollector::MarkDependentCodeForDeoptimization() {
2130 std::pair<HeapObject, Code> weak_object_in_code;
2131 while (weak_objects_.weak_objects_in_code.Pop(kMainThreadTask,
2132 &weak_object_in_code)) {
2133 HeapObject object = weak_object_in_code.first;
2134 Code code = weak_object_in_code.second;
2135 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(object) &&
2136 !code.embedded_objects_cleared()) {
2137 if (!code.marked_for_deoptimization()) {
2138 code.SetMarkedForDeoptimization("weak objects");
2139 have_code_to_deoptimize_ = true;
2140 }
2141 code.ClearEmbeddedObjects(heap_);
2142 DCHECK(code.embedded_objects_cleared())((void) 0);
2143 }
2144 }
2145}
2146
2147void MarkCompactCollector::ClearPotentialSimpleMapTransition(Map dead_target) {
2148 DCHECK(non_atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(dead_target))((void) 0);
2149 Object potential_parent = dead_target.constructor_or_backpointer();
2150 if (potential_parent.IsMap()) {
2151 Map parent = Map::cast(potential_parent);
2152 DisallowHeapAllocation no_gc_obviously;
2153 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(parent) &&
2154 TransitionsAccessor(isolate(), parent, &no_gc_obviously)
2155 .HasSimpleTransitionTo(dead_target)) {
2156 ClearPotentialSimpleMapTransition(parent, dead_target);
2157 }
2158 }
2159}
2160
2161void MarkCompactCollector::ClearPotentialSimpleMapTransition(Map map,
2162 Map dead_target) {
2163 DCHECK(!map.is_prototype_map())((void) 0);
2164 DCHECK(!dead_target.is_prototype_map())((void) 0);
2165 DCHECK_EQ(map.raw_transitions(), HeapObjectReference::Weak(dead_target))((void) 0);
2166 // Take ownership of the descriptor array.
2167 int number_of_own_descriptors = map.NumberOfOwnDescriptors();
2168 DescriptorArray descriptors = map.instance_descriptors();
2169 if (descriptors == dead_target.instance_descriptors() &&
2170 number_of_own_descriptors > 0) {
2171 TrimDescriptorArray(map, descriptors);
2172 DCHECK(descriptors.number_of_descriptors() == number_of_own_descriptors)((void) 0);
2173 }
2174}
2175
2176void MarkCompactCollector::FlushBytecodeFromSFI(
2177 SharedFunctionInfo shared_info) {
2178 DCHECK(shared_info.HasBytecodeArray())((void) 0);
2179
2180 // Retain objects required for uncompiled data.
2181 String inferred_name = shared_info.inferred_name();
2182 int start_position = shared_info.StartPosition();
2183 int end_position = shared_info.EndPosition();
2184
2185 shared_info.DiscardCompiledMetadata(
2186 isolate(), [](HeapObject object, ObjectSlot slot, HeapObject target) {
2187 RecordSlot(object, slot, target);
2188 });
2189
2190 // The size of the bytecode array should always be larger than an
2191 // UncompiledData object.
2192 STATIC_ASSERT(BytecodeArray::SizeFor(0) >=static_assert(BytecodeArray::SizeFor(0) >= UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData
::kSize, "BytecodeArray::SizeFor(0) >= UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData::kSize"
)
2193 UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData::kSize)static_assert(BytecodeArray::SizeFor(0) >= UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData
::kSize, "BytecodeArray::SizeFor(0) >= UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData::kSize"
);
2194
2195 // Replace bytecode array with an uncompiled data array.
2196 HeapObject compiled_data = shared_info.GetBytecodeArray();
2197 Address compiled_data_start = compiled_data.address();
2198 int compiled_data_size = compiled_data.Size();
2199 MemoryChunk* chunk = MemoryChunk::FromAddress(compiled_data_start);
2200
2201 // Clear any recorded slots for the compiled data as being invalid.
2202 DCHECK_NULL(chunk->sweeping_slot_set())((void) 0);
2203 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRange(
2204 chunk, compiled_data_start, compiled_data_start + compiled_data_size,
2205 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
2206 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::RemoveRange(
2207 chunk, compiled_data_start, compiled_data_start + compiled_data_size,
2208 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
2209
2210 // Swap the map, using set_map_after_allocation to avoid verify heap checks
2211 // which are not necessary since we are doing this during the GC atomic pause.
2212 compiled_data.set_map_after_allocation(
2213 ReadOnlyRoots(heap()).uncompiled_data_without_preparse_data_map(),
2214 SKIP_WRITE_BARRIER);
2215
2216 // Create a filler object for any left over space in the bytecode array.
2217 if (!heap()->IsLargeObject(compiled_data)) {
2218 heap()->CreateFillerObjectAt(
2219 compiled_data.address() + UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData::kSize,
2220 compiled_data_size - UncompiledDataWithoutPreparseData::kSize,
2221 ClearRecordedSlots::kNo);
2222 }
2223
2224 // Initialize the uncompiled data.
2225 UncompiledData uncompiled_data = UncompiledData::cast(compiled_data);
2226 uncompiled_data.InitAfterBytecodeFlush(
2227 inferred_name, start_position, end_position,
2228 [](HeapObject object, ObjectSlot slot, HeapObject target) {
2229 RecordSlot(object, slot, target);
2230 });
2231
2232 // Mark the uncompiled data as black, and ensure all fields have already been
2233 // marked.
2234 DCHECK(non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(inferred_name))((void) 0);
2235 non_atomic_marking_state()->WhiteToBlack(uncompiled_data);
2236
2237 // Use the raw function data setter to avoid validity checks, since we're
2238 // performing the unusual task of decompiling.
2239 shared_info.set_function_data(uncompiled_data);
2240 DCHECK(!shared_info.is_compiled())((void) 0);
2241}
2242
2243void MarkCompactCollector::ClearOldBytecodeCandidates() {
2244 DCHECK(FLAG_flush_bytecode ||((void) 0)
2245 weak_objects_.bytecode_flushing_candidates.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2246 SharedFunctionInfo flushing_candidate;
2247 while (weak_objects_.bytecode_flushing_candidates.Pop(kMainThreadTask,
2248 &flushing_candidate)) {
2249 // If the BytecodeArray is dead, flush it, which will replace the field with
2250 // an uncompiled data object.
2251 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(
2252 flushing_candidate.GetBytecodeArray())) {
2253 FlushBytecodeFromSFI(flushing_candidate);
2254 }
2255
2256 // Now record the slot, which has either been updated to an uncompiled data,
2257 // or is the BytecodeArray which is still alive.
2258 ObjectSlot slot =
2259 flushing_candidate.RawField(SharedFunctionInfo::kFunctionDataOffset);
2260 RecordSlot(flushing_candidate, slot, HeapObject::cast(*slot));
2261 }
2262}
2263
2264void MarkCompactCollector::ClearFlushedJsFunctions() {
2265 DCHECK(FLAG_flush_bytecode || weak_objects_.flushed_js_functions.IsEmpty())((void) 0);
2266 JSFunction flushed_js_function;
2267 while (weak_objects_.flushed_js_functions.Pop(kMainThreadTask,
2268 &flushed_js_function)) {
2269 auto gc_notify_updated_slot = [](HeapObject object, ObjectSlot slot,
2270 Object target) {
2271 RecordSlot(object, slot, HeapObject::cast(target));
2272 };
2273 flushed_js_function.ResetIfBytecodeFlushed(gc_notify_updated_slot);
2274 }
2275}
2276
2277void MarkCompactCollector::ClearFullMapTransitions() {
2278 TransitionArray array;
2279 while (weak_objects_.transition_arrays.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &array)) {
2280 int num_transitions = array.number_of_entries();
2281 if (num_transitions > 0) {
2282 Map map;
2283 // The array might contain "undefined" elements because it's not yet
2284 // filled. Allow it.
2285 if (array.GetTargetIfExists(0, isolate(), &map)) {
2286 DCHECK(!map.is_null())((void) 0); // Weak pointers aren't cleared yet.
2287 Map parent = Map::cast(map.constructor_or_backpointer());
2288 bool parent_is_alive =
2289 non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(parent);
2290 DescriptorArray descriptors =
2291 parent_is_alive ? parent.instance_descriptors() : DescriptorArray();
2292 bool descriptors_owner_died =
2293 CompactTransitionArray(parent, array, descriptors);
2294 if (descriptors_owner_died) {
2295 TrimDescriptorArray(parent, descriptors);
2296 }
2297 }
2298 }
2299 }
2300}
2301
2302bool MarkCompactCollector::CompactTransitionArray(Map map,
2303 TransitionArray transitions,
2304 DescriptorArray descriptors) {
2305 DCHECK(!map.is_prototype_map())((void) 0);
2306 int num_transitions = transitions.number_of_entries();
2307 bool descriptors_owner_died = false;
2308 int transition_index = 0;
2309 // Compact all live transitions to the left.
2310 for (int i = 0; i < num_transitions; ++i) {
2311 Map target = transitions.GetTarget(i);
2312 DCHECK_EQ(target.constructor_or_backpointer(), map)((void) 0);
2313 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(target)) {
2314 if (!descriptors.is_null() &&
2315 target.instance_descriptors() == descriptors) {
2316 DCHECK(!target.is_prototype_map())((void) 0);
2317 descriptors_owner_died = true;
2318 }
2319 } else {
2320 if (i != transition_index) {
2321 Name key = transitions.GetKey(i);
2322 transitions.SetKey(transition_index, key);
2323 HeapObjectSlot key_slot = transitions.GetKeySlot(transition_index);
2324 RecordSlot(transitions, key_slot, key);
2325 MaybeObject raw_target = transitions.GetRawTarget(i);
2326 transitions.SetRawTarget(transition_index, raw_target);
2327 HeapObjectSlot target_slot =
2328 transitions.GetTargetSlot(transition_index);
2329 RecordSlot(transitions, target_slot, raw_target->GetHeapObject());
2330 }
2331 transition_index++;
2332 }
2333 }
2334 // If there are no transitions to be cleared, return.
2335 if (transition_index == num_transitions) {
2336 DCHECK(!descriptors_owner_died)((void) 0);
2337 return false;
2338 }
2339 // Note that we never eliminate a transition array, though we might right-trim
2340 // such that number_of_transitions() == 0. If this assumption changes,
2341 // TransitionArray::Insert() will need to deal with the case that a transition
2342 // array disappeared during GC.
2343 int trim = transitions.Capacity() - transition_index;
2344 if (trim > 0) {
2345 heap_->RightTrimWeakFixedArray(transitions,
2346 trim * TransitionArray::kEntrySize);
2347 transitions.SetNumberOfTransitions(transition_index);
2348 }
2349 return descriptors_owner_died;
2350}
2351
2352void MarkCompactCollector::RightTrimDescriptorArray(DescriptorArray array,
2353 int descriptors_to_trim) {
2354 int old_nof_all_descriptors = array.number_of_all_descriptors();
2355 int new_nof_all_descriptors = old_nof_all_descriptors - descriptors_to_trim;
2356 DCHECK_LT(0, descriptors_to_trim)((void) 0);
2357 DCHECK_LE(0, new_nof_all_descriptors)((void) 0);
2358 Address start = array.GetDescriptorSlot(new_nof_all_descriptors).address();
2359 Address end = array.GetDescriptorSlot(old_nof_all_descriptors).address();
2360 MemoryChunk* chunk = MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(array);
2361 DCHECK_NULL(chunk->sweeping_slot_set())((void) 0);
2362 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRange(chunk, start, end,
2363 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
2364 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::RemoveRange(chunk, start, end,
2365 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
2366 heap()->CreateFillerObjectAt(start, static_cast<int>(end - start),
2367 ClearRecordedSlots::kNo);
2368 array.set_number_of_all_descriptors(new_nof_all_descriptors);
2369}
2370
2371void MarkCompactCollector::TrimDescriptorArray(Map map,
2372 DescriptorArray descriptors) {
2373 int number_of_own_descriptors = map.NumberOfOwnDescriptors();
2374 if (number_of_own_descriptors == 0) {
2375 DCHECK(descriptors == ReadOnlyRoots(heap_).empty_descriptor_array())((void) 0);
2376 return;
2377 }
2378 // TODO(ulan): Trim only if slack is greater than some percentage threshold.
2379 int to_trim =
2380 descriptors.number_of_all_descriptors() - number_of_own_descriptors;
2381 if (to_trim > 0) {
2382 descriptors.set_number_of_descriptors(number_of_own_descriptors);
2383 RightTrimDescriptorArray(descriptors, to_trim);
2384
2385 TrimEnumCache(map, descriptors);
2386 descriptors.Sort();
2387
2388 if (FLAG_unbox_double_fields) {
2389 LayoutDescriptor layout_descriptor = map.layout_descriptor();
2390 layout_descriptor = layout_descriptor.Trim(heap_, map, descriptors,
2391 number_of_own_descriptors);
2392 SLOW_DCHECK(layout_descriptor.IsConsistentWithMap(map, true))((void)0);
2393 }
2394 }
2395 DCHECK(descriptors.number_of_descriptors() == number_of_own_descriptors)((void) 0);
2396 map.set_owns_descriptors(true);
2397}
2398
2399void MarkCompactCollector::TrimEnumCache(Map map, DescriptorArray descriptors) {
2400 int live_enum = map.EnumLength();
2401 if (live_enum == kInvalidEnumCacheSentinel) {
2402 live_enum = map.NumberOfEnumerableProperties();
2403 }
2404 if (live_enum == 0) return descriptors.ClearEnumCache();
2405 EnumCache enum_cache = descriptors.enum_cache();
2406
2407 FixedArray keys = enum_cache.keys();
2408 int to_trim = keys.length() - live_enum;
2409 if (to_trim <= 0) return;
2410 heap_->RightTrimFixedArray(keys, to_trim);
2411
2412 FixedArray indices = enum_cache.indices();
2413 to_trim = indices.length() - live_enum;
2414 if (to_trim <= 0) return;
2415 heap_->RightTrimFixedArray(indices, to_trim);
2416}
2417
2418void MarkCompactCollector::ClearWeakCollections() {
2419 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_WEAK_COLLECTIONS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_WEAK_COLLECTIONS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2419 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2419
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2419
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2419
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2419
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2419, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2420 EphemeronHashTable table;
2421
2422 while (weak_objects_.ephemeron_hash_tables.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &table)) {
2423 for (InternalIndex i : table.IterateEntries()) {
2424 HeapObject key = HeapObject::cast(table.KeyAt(i));
2425#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
2426 if (FLAG_verify_heap) {
2427 Object value = table.ValueAt(i);
2428 if (value.IsHeapObject()) {
2429 CHECK_IMPLIES(non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(non_atomic_marking_state()->
IsBlackOrGrey(key)) || (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey
( HeapObject::cast(value))))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key)" " implies "
"non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey( HeapObject::cast(value))"
); } } while (false)
2430 non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(non_atomic_marking_state()->
IsBlackOrGrey(key)) || (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey
( HeapObject::cast(value))))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key)" " implies "
"non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey( HeapObject::cast(value))"
); } } while (false)
2431 HeapObject::cast(value)))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(non_atomic_marking_state()->
IsBlackOrGrey(key)) || (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey
( HeapObject::cast(value))))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key)" " implies "
"non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey( HeapObject::cast(value))"
); } } while (false);
2432 }
2433 }
2434#endif
2435 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(key)) {
2436 table.RemoveEntry(i);
2437 }
2438 }
2439 }
2440 for (auto it = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.begin();
2441 it != heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.end();) {
2442 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(it->first)) {
2443 it = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.erase(it);
2444 } else {
2445 ++it;
2446 }
2447 }
2448}
2449
2450void MarkCompactCollector::ClearWeakReferences() {
2451 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_CLEAR_WEAK_REFERENCES)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_CLEAR_WEAK_REFERENCES); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic2451 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2451
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2451
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2451
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2451
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2451, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
2452 std::pair<HeapObject, HeapObjectSlot> slot;
2453 HeapObjectReference cleared_weak_ref =
2454 HeapObjectReference::ClearedValue(isolate());
2455 while (weak_objects_.weak_references.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &slot)) {
2456 HeapObject value;
2457 // The slot could have been overwritten, so we have to treat it
2458 // as MaybeObjectSlot.
2459 MaybeObjectSlot location(slot.second);
2460 if ((*location)->GetHeapObjectIfWeak(&value)) {
2461 DCHECK(!value.IsCell())((void) 0);
2462 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(value)) {
2463 // The value of the weak reference is alive.
2464 RecordSlot(slot.first, HeapObjectSlot(location), value);
2465 } else {
2466 if (value.IsMap()) {
2467 // The map is non-live.
2468 ClearPotentialSimpleMapTransition(Map::cast(value));
2469 }
2470 location.store(cleared_weak_ref);
2471 }
2472 }
2473 }
2474}
2475
2476void MarkCompactCollector::ClearJSWeakRefs() {
2477 if (!FLAG_harmony_weak_refs) {
2478 return;
2479 }
2480 JSWeakRef weak_ref;
2481 while (weak_objects_.js_weak_refs.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &weak_ref)) {
2482 HeapObject target = HeapObject::cast(weak_ref.target());
2483 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(target)) {
2484 weak_ref.set_target(ReadOnlyRoots(isolate()).undefined_value());
2485 } else {
2486 // The value of the JSWeakRef is alive.
2487 ObjectSlot slot = weak_ref.RawField(JSWeakRef::kTargetOffset);
2488 RecordSlot(weak_ref, slot, target);
2489 }
2490 }
2491 WeakCell weak_cell;
2492 while (weak_objects_.weak_cells.Pop(kMainThreadTask, &weak_cell)) {
2493 auto gc_notify_updated_slot = [](HeapObject object, ObjectSlot slot,
2494 Object target) {
2495 if (target.IsHeapObject()) {
2496 RecordSlot(object, slot, HeapObject::cast(target));
2497 }
2498 };
2499 HeapObject target = HeapObject::cast(weak_cell.target());
2500 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(target)) {
2501 DCHECK(!target.IsUndefined())((void) 0);
2502 // The value of the WeakCell is dead.
2503 JSFinalizationRegistry finalization_registry =
2504 JSFinalizationRegistry::cast(weak_cell.finalization_registry());
2505 if (!finalization_registry.scheduled_for_cleanup()) {
2506 heap()->EnqueueDirtyJSFinalizationRegistry(finalization_registry,
2507 gc_notify_updated_slot);
2508 }
2509 // We're modifying the pointers in WeakCell and JSFinalizationRegistry
2510 // during GC; thus we need to record the slots it writes. The normal write
2511 // barrier is not enough, since it's disabled before GC.
2512 weak_cell.Nullify(isolate(), gc_notify_updated_slot);
2513 DCHECK(finalization_registry.NeedsCleanup())((void) 0);
2514 DCHECK(finalization_registry.scheduled_for_cleanup())((void) 0);
2515 } else {
2516 // The value of the WeakCell is alive.
2517 ObjectSlot slot = weak_cell.RawField(WeakCell::kTargetOffset);
2518 RecordSlot(weak_cell, slot, HeapObject::cast(*slot));
2519 }
2520
2521 HeapObject unregister_token =
2522 HeapObject::cast(weak_cell.unregister_token());
2523 if (!non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlackOrGrey(unregister_token)) {
2524 // The unregister token is dead. Remove any corresponding entries in the
2525 // key map. Multiple WeakCell with the same token will have all their
2526 // unregister_token field set to undefined when processing the first
2527 // WeakCell. Like above, we're modifying pointers during GC, so record the
2528 // slots.
2529 HeapObject undefined = ReadOnlyRoots(isolate()).undefined_value();
2530 JSFinalizationRegistry finalization_registry =
2531 JSFinalizationRegistry::cast(weak_cell.finalization_registry());
2532 finalization_registry.RemoveUnregisterToken(
2533 JSReceiver::cast(unregister_token), isolate(),
2534 [undefined](WeakCell matched_cell) {
2535 matched_cell.set_unregister_token(undefined);
2536 },
2537 gc_notify_updated_slot);
2538 // The following is necessary because in the case that weak_cell has
2539 // already been popped and removed from the FinalizationRegistry, the call
2540 // to JSFinalizationRegistry::RemoveUnregisterToken above will not find
2541 // weak_cell itself to clear its unregister token.
2542 weak_cell.set_unregister_token(undefined);
2543 } else {
2544 // The unregister_token is alive.
2545 ObjectSlot slot = weak_cell.RawField(WeakCell::kUnregisterTokenOffset);
2546 RecordSlot(weak_cell, slot, HeapObject::cast(*slot));
2547 }
2548 }
2549 heap()->PostFinalizationRegistryCleanupTaskIfNeeded();
2550}
2551
2552void MarkCompactCollector::AbortWeakObjects() {
2553 weak_objects_.transition_arrays.Clear();
2554 weak_objects_.ephemeron_hash_tables.Clear();
2555 weak_objects_.current_ephemerons.Clear();
2556 weak_objects_.next_ephemerons.Clear();
2557 weak_objects_.discovered_ephemerons.Clear();
2558 weak_objects_.weak_references.Clear();
2559 weak_objects_.weak_objects_in_code.Clear();
2560 weak_objects_.js_weak_refs.Clear();
2561 weak_objects_.weak_cells.Clear();
2562 weak_objects_.bytecode_flushing_candidates.Clear();
2563 weak_objects_.flushed_js_functions.Clear();
2564}
2565
2566bool MarkCompactCollector::IsOnEvacuationCandidate(MaybeObject obj) {
2567 return Page::FromAddress(obj.ptr())->IsEvacuationCandidate();
2568}
2569
2570MarkCompactCollector::RecordRelocSlotInfo
2571MarkCompactCollector::PrepareRecordRelocSlot(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo,
2572 HeapObject target) {
2573 RecordRelocSlotInfo result;
2574 result.should_record = false;
2575 Page* target_page = Page::FromHeapObject(target);
2576 Page* source_page = Page::FromHeapObject(host);
2577 if (target_page->IsEvacuationCandidate() &&
2578 (rinfo->host().is_null() ||
2579 !source_page->ShouldSkipEvacuationSlotRecording())) {
2580 RelocInfo::Mode rmode = rinfo->rmode();
2581 Address addr = rinfo->pc();
2582 SlotType slot_type = SlotTypeForRelocInfoMode(rmode);
2583 if (rinfo->IsInConstantPool()) {
2584 addr = rinfo->constant_pool_entry_address();
2585 if (RelocInfo::IsCodeTargetMode(rmode)) {
2586 slot_type = CODE_ENTRY_SLOT;
2587 } else if (RelocInfo::IsCompressedEmbeddedObject(rmode)) {
2588 slot_type = COMPRESSED_OBJECT_SLOT;
2589 } else {
2590 DCHECK(RelocInfo::IsFullEmbeddedObject(rmode))((void) 0);
2591 slot_type = FULL_OBJECT_SLOT;
2592 }
2593 }
2594 uintptr_t offset = addr - source_page->address();
2595 DCHECK_LT(offset, static_cast<uintptr_t>(TypedSlotSet::kMaxOffset))((void) 0);
2596 result.should_record = true;
2597 result.memory_chunk = source_page;
2598 result.slot_type = slot_type;
2599 result.offset = static_cast<uint32_t>(offset);
2600 }
2601 return result;
2602}
2603
2604void MarkCompactCollector::RecordRelocSlot(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo,
2605 HeapObject target) {
2606 RecordRelocSlotInfo info = PrepareRecordRelocSlot(host, rinfo, target);
2607 if (info.should_record) {
2608 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::InsertTyped(info.memory_chunk, info.slot_type,
2609 info.offset);
2610 }
2611}
2612
2613namespace {
2614
2615// Missing specialization MakeSlotValue<FullObjectSlot, WEAK>() will turn
2616// attempt to store a weak reference to strong-only slot to a compilation error.
2617template <typename TSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType reference_type>
2618typename TSlot::TObject MakeSlotValue(HeapObject heap_object);
2619
2620template <>
2621Object MakeSlotValue<ObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(
2622 HeapObject heap_object) {
2623 return heap_object;
2624}
2625
2626template <>
2627MaybeObject MakeSlotValue<MaybeObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(
2628 HeapObject heap_object) {
2629 return HeapObjectReference::Strong(heap_object);
2630}
2631
2632template <>
2633MaybeObject MakeSlotValue<MaybeObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::WEAK>(
2634 HeapObject heap_object) {
2635 return HeapObjectReference::Weak(heap_object);
2636}
2637
2638template <>
2639Object MakeSlotValue<OffHeapObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(
2640 HeapObject heap_object) {
2641 return heap_object;
2642}
2643
2644#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
2645template <>
2646Object MakeSlotValue<FullObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(
2647 HeapObject heap_object) {
2648 return heap_object;
2649}
2650
2651template <>
2652MaybeObject MakeSlotValue<FullMaybeObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(
2653 HeapObject heap_object) {
2654 return HeapObjectReference::Strong(heap_object);
2655}
2656
2657// The following specialization
2658// MakeSlotValue<FullMaybeObjectSlot, HeapObjectReferenceType::WEAK>()
2659// is not used.
2660#endif
2661
2662template <AccessMode access_mode, HeapObjectReferenceType reference_type,
2663 typename TSlot>
2664static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateSlot(TSlot slot,
2665 typename TSlot::TObject old,
2666 HeapObject heap_obj) {
2667 static_assert(std::is_same<TSlot, FullObjectSlot>::value ||
2668 std::is_same<TSlot, ObjectSlot>::value ||
2669 std::is_same<TSlot, FullMaybeObjectSlot>::value ||
2670 std::is_same<TSlot, MaybeObjectSlot>::value ||
2671 std::is_same<TSlot, OffHeapObjectSlot>::value,
2672 "Only [Full|OffHeap]ObjectSlot and [Full]MaybeObjectSlot are "
2673 "expected here");
2674 MapWord map_word = heap_obj.map_word();
2675 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
2676 DCHECK_IMPLIES(!Heap::InFromPage(heap_obj),((void) 0)
2677 MarkCompactCollector::IsOnEvacuationCandidate(heap_obj) ||((void) 0)
2678 Page::FromHeapObject(heap_obj)->IsFlagSet(((void) 0)
2679 Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED))((void) 0);
2680 typename TSlot::TObject target =
2681 MakeSlotValue<TSlot, reference_type>(map_word.ToForwardingAddress());
2682 if (access_mode == AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC) {
2683 slot.store(target);
2684 } else {
2685 slot.Release_CompareAndSwap(old, target);
2686 }
2687 DCHECK(!Heap::InFromPage(target))((void) 0);
2688 DCHECK(!MarkCompactCollector::IsOnEvacuationCandidate(target))((void) 0);
2689 } else {
2690 DCHECK(heap_obj.map().IsMap())((void) 0);
2691 }
2692 // OLD_TO_OLD slots are always removed after updating.
2693 return REMOVE_SLOT;
2694}
2695
2696template <AccessMode access_mode, typename TSlot>
2697static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateSlot(const Isolate* isolate,
2698 TSlot slot) {
2699 typename TSlot::TObject obj = slot.Relaxed_Load(isolate);
2700 HeapObject heap_obj;
2701 if (TSlot::kCanBeWeak && obj->GetHeapObjectIfWeak(&heap_obj)) {
2702 UpdateSlot<access_mode, HeapObjectReferenceType::WEAK>(slot, obj, heap_obj);
2703 } else if (obj->GetHeapObjectIfStrong(&heap_obj)) {
2704 return UpdateSlot<access_mode, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(slot, obj,
2705 heap_obj);
2706 }
2707 return REMOVE_SLOT;
2708}
2709
2710template <AccessMode access_mode, typename TSlot>
2711static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateStrongSlot(const Isolate* isolate,
2712 TSlot slot) {
2713 typename TSlot::TObject obj = slot.Relaxed_Load(isolate);
2714 DCHECK(!HAS_WEAK_HEAP_OBJECT_TAG(obj.ptr()))((void) 0);
2715 HeapObject heap_obj;
2716 if (obj.GetHeapObject(&heap_obj)) {
2717 return UpdateSlot<access_mode, HeapObjectReferenceType::STRONG>(slot, obj,
2718 heap_obj);
2719 }
2720 return REMOVE_SLOT;
2721}
2722
2723} // namespace
2724
2725// Visitor for updating root pointers and to-space pointers.
2726// It does not expect to encounter pointers to dead objects.
2727class PointersUpdatingVisitor : public ObjectVisitor, public RootVisitor {
2728 public:
2729 explicit PointersUpdatingVisitor(const Isolate* isolate)
2730 : isolate_(isolate) {}
2731
2732 void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot p) override {
2733 UpdateStrongSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2734 }
2735
2736 void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot p) override {
2737 UpdateSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2738 }
2739
2740 void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot start,
2741 ObjectSlot end) override {
2742 for (ObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
2743 UpdateStrongSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2744 }
2745 }
2746
2747 void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot start,
2748 MaybeObjectSlot end) final {
2749 for (MaybeObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
2750 UpdateSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2751 }
2752 }
2753
2754 void VisitRootPointer(Root root, const char* description,
2755 FullObjectSlot p) override {
2756 UpdateRootSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2757 }
2758
2759 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
2760 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
2761 for (FullObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
2762 UpdateRootSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2763 }
2764 }
2765
2766 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
2767 OffHeapObjectSlot start,
2768 OffHeapObjectSlot end) override {
2769 for (OffHeapObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
2770 UpdateRootSlotInternal(isolate_, p);
2771 }
2772 }
2773
2774 void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
2775 // This visitor nevers visits code objects.
2776 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
2777 }
2778
2779 void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
2780 // This visitor nevers visits code objects.
2781 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
2782 }
2783
2784 private:
2785 static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateRootSlotInternal(
2786 const Isolate* isolate, FullObjectSlot slot) {
2787 return UpdateStrongSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
2788 }
2789
2790 static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateRootSlotInternal(
2791 const Isolate* isolate, OffHeapObjectSlot slot) {
2792 return UpdateStrongSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
2793 }
2794
2795 static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateStrongMaybeObjectSlotInternal(
2796 const Isolate* isolate, MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
2797 return UpdateStrongSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
2798 }
2799
2800 static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateStrongSlotInternal(
2801 const Isolate* isolate, ObjectSlot slot) {
2802 return UpdateStrongSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
2803 }
2804
2805 static inline SlotCallbackResult UpdateSlotInternal(const Isolate* isolate,
2806 MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
2807 return UpdateSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
2808 }
2809
2810 const Isolate* isolate_;
2811};
2812
2813static String UpdateReferenceInExternalStringTableEntry(Heap* heap,
2814 FullObjectSlot p) {
2815 MapWord map_word = HeapObject::cast(*p).map_word();
2816
2817 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
2818 String new_string = String::cast(map_word.ToForwardingAddress());
2819
2820 if (new_string.IsExternalString()) {
2821 MemoryChunk::MoveExternalBackingStoreBytes(
2822 ExternalBackingStoreType::kExternalString,
2823 Page::FromAddress((*p).ptr()), Page::FromHeapObject(new_string),
2824 ExternalString::cast(new_string).ExternalPayloadSize());
2825 }
2826 return new_string;
2827 }
2828
2829 return String::cast(*p);
2830}
2831
2832void MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePrologue() {
2833 // New space.
2834 NewSpace* new_space = heap()->new_space();
2835 // Append the list of new space pages to be processed.
2836 for (Page* p :
2837 PageRange(new_space->first_allocatable_address(), new_space->top())) {
2838 new_space_evacuation_pages_.push_back(p);
2839 }
2840 new_space->Flip();
2841 new_space->ResetLinearAllocationArea();
2842
2843 DCHECK_EQ(new_space->Size(), 0)((void) 0);
2844
2845 heap()->new_lo_space()->Flip();
2846 heap()->new_lo_space()->ResetPendingObject();
2847
2848 // Old space.
2849 DCHECK(old_space_evacuation_pages_.empty())((void) 0);
2850 old_space_evacuation_pages_ = std::move(evacuation_candidates_);
2851 evacuation_candidates_.clear();
2852 DCHECK(evacuation_candidates_.empty())((void) 0);
2853}
2854
2855void MarkCompactCollector::EvacuateEpilogue() {
2856 aborted_evacuation_candidates_.clear();
2857 // New space.
2858 heap()->new_space()->set_age_mark(heap()->new_space()->top());
2859 DCHECK_IMPLIES(FLAG_always_promote_young_mc,((void) 0)
2860 heap()->new_space()->Size() == 0)((void) 0);
2861 // Deallocate unmarked large objects.
2862 heap()->lo_space()->FreeUnmarkedObjects();
2863 heap()->code_lo_space()->FreeUnmarkedObjects();
2864 heap()->new_lo_space()->FreeUnmarkedObjects();
2865 // Old space. Deallocate evacuated candidate pages.
2866 ReleaseEvacuationCandidates();
2867 // Give pages that are queued to be freed back to the OS.
2868 heap()->memory_allocator()->unmapper()->FreeQueuedChunks();
2869#ifdef DEBUG
2870 // Old-to-old slot sets must be empty after evacuation.
2871 for (Page* p : *heap()->old_space()) {
2872 DCHECK_NULL((p->slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::ATOMIC>()))((void) 0);
2873 DCHECK_NULL((p->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::ATOMIC>()))((void) 0);
2874 DCHECK_NULL(p->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_OLD>())((void) 0);
2875 DCHECK_NULL(p->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_NEW>())((void) 0);
2876 }
2877#endif
2878}
2879
2880class Evacuator : public Malloced {
2881 public:
2882 enum EvacuationMode {
2883 kObjectsNewToOld,
2884 kPageNewToOld,
2885 kObjectsOldToOld,
2886 kPageNewToNew,
2887 };
2888
2889 static const char* EvacuationModeName(EvacuationMode mode) {
2890 switch (mode) {
2891 case kObjectsNewToOld:
2892 return "objects-new-to-old";
2893 case kPageNewToOld:
2894 return "page-new-to-old";
2895 case kObjectsOldToOld:
2896 return "objects-old-to-old";
2897 case kPageNewToNew:
2898 return "page-new-to-new";
2899 }
2900 }
2901
2902 static inline EvacuationMode ComputeEvacuationMode(MemoryChunk* chunk) {
2903 // Note: The order of checks is important in this function.
2904 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION))
2905 return kPageNewToOld;
2906 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION))
2907 return kPageNewToNew;
2908 if (chunk->InYoungGeneration()) return kObjectsNewToOld;
2909 return kObjectsOldToOld;
2910 }
2911
2912 // NewSpacePages with more live bytes than this threshold qualify for fast
2913 // evacuation.
2914 static intptr_t NewSpacePageEvacuationThreshold() {
2915 if (FLAG_page_promotion)
2916 return FLAG_page_promotion_threshold *
2917 MemoryChunkLayout::AllocatableMemoryInDataPage() / 100;
2918 return MemoryChunkLayout::AllocatableMemoryInDataPage() + kTaggedSize;
2919 }
2920
2921 Evacuator(Heap* heap, RecordMigratedSlotVisitor* record_visitor,
2922 EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator, bool always_promote_young)
2923 : heap_(heap),
2924 local_pretenuring_feedback_(kInitialLocalPretenuringFeedbackCapacity),
2925 new_space_visitor_(heap_, local_allocator, record_visitor,
2926 &local_pretenuring_feedback_, always_promote_young),
2927 new_to_new_page_visitor_(heap_, record_visitor,
2928 &local_pretenuring_feedback_),
2929 new_to_old_page_visitor_(heap_, record_visitor,
2930 &local_pretenuring_feedback_),
2931
2932 old_space_visitor_(heap_, local_allocator, record_visitor),
2933 local_allocator_(local_allocator),
2934 duration_(0.0),
2935 bytes_compacted_(0) {}
2936
2937 virtual ~Evacuator() = default;
2938
2939 void EvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk);
2940
2941 void AddObserver(MigrationObserver* observer) {
2942 new_space_visitor_.AddObserver(observer);
2943 old_space_visitor_.AddObserver(observer);
2944 }
2945
2946 // Merge back locally cached info sequentially. Note that this method needs
2947 // to be called from the main thread.
2948 inline void Finalize();
2949
2950 virtual GCTracer::BackgroundScope::ScopeId GetBackgroundTracingScope() = 0;
2951 virtual GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId GetTracingScope() = 0;
2952
2953 protected:
2954 static const int kInitialLocalPretenuringFeedbackCapacity = 256;
2955
2956 // |saved_live_bytes| returns the live bytes of the page that was processed.
2957 virtual void RawEvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk,
2958 intptr_t* saved_live_bytes) = 0;
2959
2960 inline Heap* heap() { return heap_; }
2961
2962 void ReportCompactionProgress(double duration, intptr_t bytes_compacted) {
2963 duration_ += duration;
2964 bytes_compacted_ += bytes_compacted;
2965 }
2966
2967 Heap* heap_;
2968
2969 Heap::PretenuringFeedbackMap local_pretenuring_feedback_;
2970
2971 // Visitors for the corresponding spaces.
2972 EvacuateNewSpaceVisitor new_space_visitor_;
2973 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<PageEvacuationMode::NEW_TO_NEW>
2974 new_to_new_page_visitor_;
2975 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<PageEvacuationMode::NEW_TO_OLD>
2976 new_to_old_page_visitor_;
2977 EvacuateOldSpaceVisitor old_space_visitor_;
2978
2979 // Locally cached collector data.
2980 EvacuationAllocator* local_allocator_;
2981
2982 // Book keeping info.
2983 double duration_;
2984 intptr_t bytes_compacted_;
2985};
2986
2987void Evacuator::EvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk) {
2988 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"), "Evacuator::EvacuatePage")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic2988 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2988
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic2988
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer2988
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988, "Evacuator::EvacuatePage"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer2988 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled2988
, "Evacuator::EvacuatePage", h); };
2989 DCHECK(chunk->SweepingDone())((void) 0);
2990 intptr_t saved_live_bytes = 0;
2991 double evacuation_time = 0.0;
2992 {
2993 AlwaysAllocateScope always_allocate(heap());
2994 TimedScope timed_scope(&evacuation_time);
2995 RawEvacuatePage(chunk, &saved_live_bytes);
2996 }
2997 ReportCompactionProgress(evacuation_time, saved_live_bytes);
2998 if (FLAG_trace_evacuation) {
2999 PrintIsolate(heap()->isolate(),
3000 "evacuation[%p]: page=%p new_space=%d "
3001 "page_evacuation=%d executable=%d contains_age_mark=%d "
3002 "live_bytes=%" V8PRIdPTR"l" "d" " time=%f success=%d\n",
3003 static_cast<void*>(this), static_cast<void*>(chunk),
3004 chunk->InNewSpace(),
3005 chunk->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION) ||
3006 chunk->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION),
3007 chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::IS_EXECUTABLE),
3008 chunk->Contains(heap()->new_space()->age_mark()),
3009 saved_live_bytes, evacuation_time,
3010 chunk->IsFlagSet(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED));
3011 }
3012}
3013
3014void Evacuator::Finalize() {
3015 local_allocator_->Finalize();
3016 heap()->tracer()->AddCompactionEvent(duration_, bytes_compacted_);
3017 heap()->IncrementPromotedObjectsSize(new_space_visitor_.promoted_size() +
3018 new_to_old_page_visitor_.moved_bytes());
3019 heap()->IncrementSemiSpaceCopiedObjectSize(
3020 new_space_visitor_.semispace_copied_size() +
3021 new_to_new_page_visitor_.moved_bytes());
3022 heap()->IncrementYoungSurvivorsCounter(
3023 new_space_visitor_.promoted_size() +
3024 new_space_visitor_.semispace_copied_size() +
3025 new_to_old_page_visitor_.moved_bytes() +
3026 new_to_new_page_visitor_.moved_bytes());
3027 heap()->MergeAllocationSitePretenuringFeedback(local_pretenuring_feedback_);
3028}
3029
3030class FullEvacuator : public Evacuator {
3031 public:
3032 explicit FullEvacuator(MarkCompactCollector* collector)
3033 : Evacuator(collector->heap(), &record_visitor_, &local_allocator_,
3034 FLAG_always_promote_young_mc),
3035 record_visitor_(collector, &ephemeron_remembered_set_),
3036 local_allocator_(heap_, LocalSpaceKind::kCompactionSpaceForMarkCompact),
3037 collector_(collector) {}
3038
3039 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::ScopeId GetBackgroundTracingScope() override {
3040 return GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MC_BACKGROUND_EVACUATE_COPY;
3041 }
3042
3043 GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId GetTracingScope() override {
3044 return GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_COPY_PARALLEL;
3045 }
3046
3047 inline void Finalize() {
3048 Evacuator::Finalize();
3049
3050 for (auto it = ephemeron_remembered_set_.begin();
3051 it != ephemeron_remembered_set_.end(); ++it) {
3052 auto insert_result =
3053 heap()->ephemeron_remembered_set_.insert({it->first, it->second});
3054 if (!insert_result.second) {
3055 // Insertion didn't happen, there was already an item.
3056 auto set = insert_result.first->second;
3057 for (int entry : it->second) {
3058 set.insert(entry);
3059 }
3060 }
3061 }
3062 }
3063
3064 protected:
3065 void RawEvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk, intptr_t* live_bytes) override;
3066 EphemeronRememberedSet ephemeron_remembered_set_;
3067 RecordMigratedSlotVisitor record_visitor_;
3068 EvacuationAllocator local_allocator_;
3069
3070 MarkCompactCollector* collector_;
3071};
3072
3073void FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk, intptr_t* live_bytes) {
3074 const EvacuationMode evacuation_mode = ComputeEvacuationMode(chunk);
3075 MarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state =
3076 collector_->non_atomic_marking_state();
3077 *live_bytes = marking_state->live_bytes(chunk);
3078 TRACE_EVENT2(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3080 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3080
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080, "FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0)), "evacuation_mode", EvacuationModeName(evacuation_mode
), "live_bytes", *live_bytes); trace_event_unique_tracer3080 .
Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080, "FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, h); }
3079 "FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage", "evacuation_mode",static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3080 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080

); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3080
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base

)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags

, h); }
3080 EvacuationModeName(evacuation_mode), "live_bytes", *live_bytes)static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3080 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3080
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3080
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080, "FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0)), "evacuation_mode", EvacuationModeName(evacuation_mode
), "live_bytes", *live_bytes); trace_event_unique_tracer3080 .
Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3080, "FullEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, h); };
3081 HeapObject failed_object;
3082 switch (evacuation_mode) {
3083 case kObjectsNewToOld:
3084 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(
3085 chunk, marking_state, &new_space_visitor_,
3086 LiveObjectVisitor::kClearMarkbits);
3087 break;
3088 case kPageNewToOld:
3089 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(
3090 chunk, marking_state, &new_to_old_page_visitor_,
3091 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
3092 new_to_old_page_visitor_.account_moved_bytes(
3093 marking_state->live_bytes(chunk));
3094 break;
3095 case kPageNewToNew:
3096 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(
3097 chunk, marking_state, &new_to_new_page_visitor_,
3098 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
3099 new_to_new_page_visitor_.account_moved_bytes(
3100 marking_state->live_bytes(chunk));
3101 break;
3102 case kObjectsOldToOld: {
3103 const bool success = LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects(
3104 chunk, marking_state, &old_space_visitor_,
3105 LiveObjectVisitor::kClearMarkbits, &failed_object);
3106 if (!success) {
3107 // Aborted compaction page. Actual processing happens on the main
3108 // thread for simplicity reasons.
3109 collector_->ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidate(failed_object, chunk);
3110 }
3111 break;
3112 }
3113 }
3114}
3115
3116class EvacuationItem : public ItemParallelJob::Item {
3117 public:
3118 explicit EvacuationItem(MemoryChunk* chunk) : chunk_(chunk) {}
3119 ~EvacuationItem() override = default;
3120 MemoryChunk* chunk() const { return chunk_; }
3121
3122 private:
3123 MemoryChunk* chunk_;
3124};
3125
3126class PageEvacuationTask : public ItemParallelJob::Task {
3127 public:
3128 PageEvacuationTask(Isolate* isolate, Evacuator* evacuator)
3129 : ItemParallelJob::Task(isolate),
3130 evacuator_(evacuator),
3131 tracer_(isolate->heap()->tracer()) {}
3132
3133 void RunInParallel(Runner runner) override {
3134 if (runner == Runner::kForeground) {

() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3135
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3135
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3135
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3135
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags

3136 ProcessItems();
3137 } else {

->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats()); GCTracer::BackgroundScope

), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3138
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3138
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3138
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
