.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3138, GCTracer
::BackgroundScope::Name(evacuator_->GetBackgroundTracingScope
()), h); };
3139 ProcessItems();
3140 }
3141 }
3142
3143 private:
3144 void ProcessItems() {
3145 EvacuationItem* item = nullptr;
3146 while ((item = GetItem<EvacuationItem>()) != nullptr) {
3147 evacuator_->EvacuatePage(item->chunk());
3148 item->MarkFinished();
3149 }
3150 }
3151 Evacuator* evacuator_;
3152 GCTracer* tracer_;
3153};
3154
3155template <class Evacuator, class Collector>
3156void MarkCompactCollectorBase::CreateAndExecuteEvacuationTasks(
3157 Collector* collector, ItemParallelJob* job,
3158 MigrationObserver* migration_observer, const intptr_t live_bytes) {
3159 // Used for trace summary.
3160 double compaction_speed = 0;
3161 if (FLAG_trace_evacuation) {
3162 compaction_speed = heap()->tracer()->CompactionSpeedInBytesPerMillisecond();
3163 }
3164
3165 const bool profiling = isolate()->LogObjectRelocation();
3166 ProfilingMigrationObserver profiling_observer(heap());
3167
3168 const int wanted_num_tasks =
3169 NumberOfParallelCompactionTasks(job->NumberOfItems());
3170 Evacuator** evacuators = new Evacuator*[wanted_num_tasks];
3171 for (int i = 0; i < wanted_num_tasks; i++) {
3172 evacuators[i] = new Evacuator(collector);
3173 if (profiling) evacuators[i]->AddObserver(&profiling_observer);
3174 if (migration_observer != nullptr)
3175 evacuators[i]->AddObserver(migration_observer);
3176 job->AddTask(new PageEvacuationTask(heap()->isolate(), evacuators[i]));
3177 }
3178 job->Run();
3179 for (int i = 0; i < wanted_num_tasks; i++) {
3180 evacuators[i]->Finalize();
3181 delete evacuators[i];
3182 }
3183 delete[] evacuators;
3184
3185 if (FLAG_trace_evacuation) {
3186 PrintIsolate(isolate(),
3187 "%8.0f ms: evacuation-summary: parallel=%s pages=%d "
3188 "wanted_tasks=%d tasks=%d cores=%d live_bytes=%" V8PRIdPTR"l" "d"
3189 " compaction_speed=%.f\n",
3190 isolate()->time_millis_since_init(),
3191 FLAG_parallel_compaction ? "yes" : "no", job->NumberOfItems(),
3192 wanted_num_tasks, job->NumberOfTasks(),
3193 V8::GetCurrentPlatform()->NumberOfWorkerThreads() + 1,
3194 live_bytes, compaction_speed);
3195 }
3196}
3197
3198bool MarkCompactCollectorBase::ShouldMovePage(Page* p, intptr_t live_bytes,
3199 bool always_promote_young) {
3200 const bool reduce_memory = heap()->ShouldReduceMemory();
3201 const Address age_mark = heap()->new_space()->age_mark();
3202 return !reduce_memory && !p->NeverEvacuate() &&
3203 (live_bytes > Evacuator::NewSpacePageEvacuationThreshold()) &&
3204 (always_promote_young || !p->Contains(age_mark)) &&
3205 heap()->CanExpandOldGeneration(live_bytes);
3206}
3207
3208void MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel() {
3209 ItemParallelJob evacuation_job(isolate()->cancelable_task_manager(),
3210 &page_parallel_job_semaphore_);
3211 intptr_t live_bytes = 0;
3212
3213 for (Page* page : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
3214 live_bytes += non_atomic_marking_state()->live_bytes(page);
3215 evacuation_job.AddItem(new EvacuationItem(page));
3216 }
3217
3218 for (Page* page : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
3219 intptr_t live_bytes_on_page = non_atomic_marking_state()->live_bytes(page);
3220 if (live_bytes_on_page == 0) continue;
3221 live_bytes += live_bytes_on_page;
3222 if (ShouldMovePage(page, live_bytes_on_page,
3223 FLAG_always_promote_young_mc)) {
3224 if (page->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::NEW_SPACE_BELOW_AGE_MARK) ||
3225 FLAG_always_promote_young_mc) {
3226 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<NEW_TO_OLD>::Move(page);
3227 DCHECK_EQ(heap()->old_space(), page->owner())((void) 0);
3228 // The move added page->allocated_bytes to the old space, but we are
3229 // going to sweep the page and add page->live_byte_count.
3230 heap()->old_space()->DecreaseAllocatedBytes(page->allocated_bytes(),
3231 page);
3232 } else {
3233 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<NEW_TO_NEW>::Move(page);
3234 }
3235 }
3236 evacuation_job.AddItem(new EvacuationItem(page));
3237 }
3238
3239 // Promote young generation large objects.
3240 IncrementalMarking::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state =
3241 heap()->incremental_marking()->non_atomic_marking_state();
3242
3243 for (auto it = heap()->new_lo_space()->begin();
3244 it != heap()->new_lo_space()->end();) {
3245 LargePage* current = *it;
3246 it++;
3247 HeapObject object = current->GetObject();
3248 DCHECK(!marking_state->IsGrey(object))((void) 0);
3249 if (marking_state->IsBlack(object)) {
3250 heap_->lo_space()->PromoteNewLargeObject(current);
3251 current->SetFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
3252 evacuation_job.AddItem(new EvacuationItem(current));
3253 }
3254 }
3255
3256 if (evacuation_job.NumberOfItems() == 0) return;
3257
3258 TRACE_EVENT1(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3260 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3260
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0)), "pages", evacuation_job.NumberOfItems()); trace_event_unique_tracer3260
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, h); }
3259 "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel", "pages",static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3260 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3260
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0)), "pages", evacuation_job.NumberOfItems()); trace_event_unique_tracer3260
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, h); }
3260 evacuation_job.NumberOfItems())static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3260 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3260
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3260
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0)), "pages", evacuation_job.NumberOfItems()); trace_event_unique_tracer3260
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3260, "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel"
, h); };
3261
3262 CreateAndExecuteEvacuationTasks<FullEvacuator>(this, &evacuation_job, nullptr,
3263 live_bytes);
3264
3265 // After evacuation there might still be swept pages that weren't
3266 // added to one of the compaction space but still reside in the
3267 // sweeper's swept_list_. Merge remembered sets for those pages as
3268 // well such that after mark-compact all pages either store slots
3269 // in the sweeping or old-to-new remembered set.
3270 sweeper()->MergeOldToNewRememberedSetsForSweptPages();
3271
3272 PostProcessEvacuationCandidates();
3273}
3274
3275class EvacuationWeakObjectRetainer : public WeakObjectRetainer {
3276 public:
3277 Object RetainAs(Object object) override {
3278 if (object.IsHeapObject()) {
3279 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(object);
3280 MapWord map_word = heap_object.map_word();
3281 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
3282 return map_word.ToForwardingAddress();
3283 }
3284 }
3285 return object;
3286 }
3287};
3288
3289void MarkCompactCollector::RecordLiveSlotsOnPage(Page* page) {
3290 EvacuateRecordOnlyVisitor visitor(heap());
3291 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(page, non_atomic_marking_state(),
3292 &visitor,
3293 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
3294}
3295
3296template <class Visitor, typename MarkingState>
3297bool LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects(MemoryChunk* chunk,
3298 MarkingState* marking_state,
3299 Visitor* visitor,
3300 IterationMode iteration_mode,
3301 HeapObject* failed_object) {
3302 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3303 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3303
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3303
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3303
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3303 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects", h); }
3303 "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3303 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3303
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3303
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3303
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3303 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3303
, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjects", h); };
3304 for (auto object_and_size :
3305 LiveObjectRange<kBlackObjects>(chunk, marking_state->bitmap(chunk))) {
3306 HeapObject const object = object_and_size.first;
3307 if (!visitor->Visit(object, object_and_size.second)) {
3308 if (iteration_mode == kClearMarkbits) {
3309 marking_state->bitmap(chunk)->ClearRange(
3310 chunk->AddressToMarkbitIndex(chunk->area_start()),
3311 chunk->AddressToMarkbitIndex(object.address()));
3312 *failed_object = object;
3313 }
3314 return false;
3315 }
3316 }
3317 if (iteration_mode == kClearMarkbits) {
3318 marking_state->ClearLiveness(chunk);
3319 }
3320 return true;
3321}
3322
3323template <class Visitor, typename MarkingState>
3324void LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(MemoryChunk* chunk,
3325 MarkingState* marking_state,
3326 Visitor* visitor,
3327 IterationMode iteration_mode) {

3329 "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3329 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3329
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329

); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3329
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3329
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3329 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3329
, "LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail", h); };
3330 if (chunk->IsLargePage()) {
3331 HeapObject object = reinterpret_cast<LargePage*>(chunk)->GetObject();
3332 if (marking_state->IsBlack(object)) {
3333 const bool success = visitor->Visit(object, object.Size());
3334 USE(success)do { ::v8::base::Use unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro[]{success
}; (void)unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro; } while (false);
3335 DCHECK(success)((void) 0);
3336 }
3337 } else {
3338 for (auto object_and_size :
3339 LiveObjectRange<kBlackObjects>(chunk, marking_state->bitmap(chunk))) {
3340 HeapObject const object = object_and_size.first;
3341 DCHECK(marking_state->IsBlack(object))((void) 0);
3342 const bool success = visitor->Visit(object, object_and_size.second);
3343 USE(success)do { ::v8::base::Use unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro[]{success
}; (void)unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro; } while (false);
3344 DCHECK(success)((void) 0);
3345 }
3346 }
3347 if (iteration_mode == kClearMarkbits) {
3348 marking_state->ClearLiveness(chunk);
3349 }
3350}

3379}
3380
3381template <typename MarkingState>
3382void LiveObjectVisitor::RecomputeLiveBytes(MemoryChunk* chunk,
3383 MarkingState* marking_state) {
3384 int new_live_size = 0;
3385 for (auto object_and_size :
3386 LiveObjectRange<kAllLiveObjects>(chunk, marking_state->bitmap(chunk))) {
3387 new_live_size += object_and_size.second;
3388 }
3389 marking_state->SetLiveBytes(chunk, new_live_size);
3390}

3415
3416 // Give pages that are queued to be freed back to the OS. Note that filtering
3417 // slots only handles old space (for unboxed doubles), and thus map space can
3418 // still contain stale pointers. We only free the chunks after pointer updates
3419 // to still have access to page headers.
3420 heap()->memory_allocator()->unmapper()->FreeQueuedChunks();
3421
3422 {
3423 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_CLEAN_UP)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::

->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic3423 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423

<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3423
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3423
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3423
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3423
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3423, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
3424
3425 for (Page* p : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
3426 if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION)) {
3427 p->ClearFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION);
3428 sweeper()->AddPageForIterability(p);
3429 } else if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION)) {
3430 p->ClearFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
3431 DCHECK_EQ(OLD_SPACE, p->owner_identity())((void) 0);
3432 sweeper()->AddPage(OLD_SPACE, p, Sweeper::REGULAR);
3433 }
3434 }
3435 new_space_evacuation_pages_.clear();
3436
3437 for (Page* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
3438 if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) {
3439 sweeper()->AddPage(p->owner_identity(), p, Sweeper::REGULAR);
3440 p->ClearFlag(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED);
3441 }
3442 }
3443 }
3444
3445 {
3446 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_EPILOGUE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_EVACUATE_EPILOGUE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()
->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic3446 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3446
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3446
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3446
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3446
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3446, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
3447 EvacuateEpilogue();
3448 }
3449
3450#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
3451 if (FLAG_verify_heap && !sweeper()->sweeping_in_progress()) {
3452 FullEvacuationVerifier verifier(heap());
3453 verifier.Run();
3454 }
3455#endif
3456}
3457
3458class UpdatingItem : public ItemParallelJob::Item {
3459 public:
3460 ~UpdatingItem() override = default;
3461 virtual void Process() = 0;
3462};
3463
3464class PointersUpdatingTask : public ItemParallelJob::Task {
3465 public:
3466 explicit PointersUpdatingTask(
3467 Isolate* isolate, GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId scope,
3468 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::ScopeId background_scope)
3469 : ItemParallelJob::Task(isolate),
3470 tracer_(isolate->heap()->tracer()),
3471 scope_(scope),
3472 background_scope_(background_scope) {}
3473
3474 void RunInParallel(Runner runner) override {
3475 if (runner == Runner::kForeground) {
3476 TRACE_GC(tracer_, scope_)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(scope_); GCTracer
::Scope gc_tracer_scope(tracer_, gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8
::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3476 = 0; const uint8_t
* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476
= reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load
(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3476))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476
) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476 = v8::internal
::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled
("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"); v8::base
::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3476), (reinterpret_cast
<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3476
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3476
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3476, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
3477 UpdatePointers();
3478 } else {
3479 TRACE_BACKGROUND_GC(tracer_, background_scope_)WorkerThreadRuntimeCallStatsScope runtime_call_stats_scope( tracer_
->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats()); GCTracer::BackgroundScope
background_scope(tracer_, background_scope_, runtime_call_stats_scope
.Get()); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3479
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3479
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3479
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3479
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479, GCTracer::BackgroundScope
::Name(background_scope_), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3479
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3479, GCTracer
::BackgroundScope::Name(background_scope_), h); };
3480 UpdatePointers();
3481 }
3482 }
3483
3484 private:
3485 void UpdatePointers() {
3486 UpdatingItem* item = nullptr;
3487 while ((item = GetItem<UpdatingItem>()) != nullptr) {
3488 item->Process();
3489 item->MarkFinished();
3490 }
3491 }
3492 GCTracer* tracer_;
3493 GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId scope_;
3494 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::ScopeId background_scope_;
3495};
3496
3497template <typename MarkingState>
3498class ToSpaceUpdatingItem : public UpdatingItem {
3499 public:
3500 explicit ToSpaceUpdatingItem(MemoryChunk* chunk, Address start, Address end,
3501 MarkingState* marking_state)
3502 : chunk_(chunk),
3503 start_(start),
3504 end_(end),
3505 marking_state_(marking_state) {}
3506 ~ToSpaceUpdatingItem() override = default;
3507
3508 void Process() override {
3509 if (chunk_->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION)) {
3510 // New->new promoted pages contain garbage so they require iteration using
3511 // markbits.
3512 ProcessVisitLive();
3513 } else {
3514 ProcessVisitAll();
3515 }
3516 }
3517
3518 private:
3519 void ProcessVisitAll() {
3520 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3521 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3521
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3521
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3521
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitAll"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3521 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitAll", h); }
3521 "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitAll")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3521 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3521
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3521
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3521
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitAll"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3521 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3521
, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitAll", h); };
3522 PointersUpdatingVisitor visitor(
3523 GetIsolateForPtrComprFromOnHeapAddress(start_));
3524 for (Address cur = start_; cur < end_;) {
3525 HeapObject object = HeapObject::FromAddress(cur);
3526 Map map = object.map();
3527 int size = object.SizeFromMap(map);
3528 object.IterateBodyFast(map, size, &visitor);
3529 cur += size;
3530 }
3531 }
3532
3533 void ProcessVisitLive() {
3534 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3535 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3535
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3535
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3535
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitLive"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3535 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitLive", h); }
3535 "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitLive")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3535 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3535
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3535
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3535
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitLive"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3535 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3535
, "ToSpaceUpdatingItem::ProcessVisitLive", h); };
3536 // For young generation evacuations we want to visit grey objects, for
3537 // full MC, we need to visit black objects.
3538 PointersUpdatingVisitor visitor(
3539 GetIsolateForPtrComprFromOnHeapAddress(start_));
3540 for (auto object_and_size : LiveObjectRange<kAllLiveObjects>(
3541 chunk_, marking_state_->bitmap(chunk_))) {
3542 object_and_size.first.IterateBodyFast(&visitor);
3543 }
3544 }
3545
3546 MemoryChunk* chunk_;
3547 Address start_;
3548 Address end_;
3549 MarkingState* marking_state_;
3550};
3551
3552template <typename MarkingState, GarbageCollector collector>
3553class RememberedSetUpdatingItem : public UpdatingItem {
3554 public:
3555 explicit RememberedSetUpdatingItem(Heap* heap, MarkingState* marking_state,
3556 MemoryChunk* chunk,
3557 RememberedSetUpdatingMode updating_mode)
3558 : heap_(heap),
3559 marking_state_(marking_state),
3560 chunk_(chunk),
3561 updating_mode_(updating_mode) {}
3562 ~RememberedSetUpdatingItem() override = default;
3563
3564 void Process() override {
3565 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3566 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3566
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3566
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3566
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566, "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3566 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
, "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process", h); }
3566 "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3566 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3566
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3566
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3566
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566, "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3566 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3566
, "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process", h); };
3567 base::MutexGuard guard(chunk_->mutex());
3568 CodePageMemoryModificationScope memory_modification_scope(chunk_);
3569 UpdateUntypedPointers();
3570 UpdateTypedPointers();
3571 }
3572
3573 private:
3574 template <typename TSlot>
3575 inline SlotCallbackResult CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(TSlot slot) {
3576 static_assert(
3577 std::is_same<TSlot, FullMaybeObjectSlot>::value ||
3578 std::is_same<TSlot, MaybeObjectSlot>::value,
3579 "Only FullMaybeObjectSlot and MaybeObjectSlot are expected here");
3580 using THeapObjectSlot = typename TSlot::THeapObjectSlot;
3581 HeapObject heap_object;
3582 if (!(*slot).GetHeapObject(&heap_object)) {
3583 return REMOVE_SLOT;
3584 }
3585 if (Heap::InFromPage(heap_object)) {
3586 MapWord map_word = heap_object.map_word();
3587 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
3588 HeapObjectReference::Update(THeapObjectSlot(slot),
3589 map_word.ToForwardingAddress());
3590 }
3591 bool success = (*slot).GetHeapObject(&heap_object);
3592 USE(success)do { ::v8::base::Use unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro[]{success
}; (void)unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro; } while (false);
3593 DCHECK(success)((void) 0);
3594 // If the object was in from space before and is after executing the
3595 // callback in to space, the object is still live.
3596 // Unfortunately, we do not know about the slot. It could be in a
3597 // just freed free space object.
3598 if (Heap::InToPage(heap_object)) {
3599 return KEEP_SLOT;
3600 }
3601 } else if (Heap::InToPage(heap_object)) {
3602 // Slots can point to "to" space if the page has been moved, or if the
3603 // slot has been recorded multiple times in the remembered set, or
3604 // if the slot was already updated during old->old updating.
3605 // In case the page has been moved, check markbits to determine liveness
3606 // of the slot. In the other case, the slot can just be kept.
3607 if (Page::FromHeapObject(heap_object)
3608 ->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION)) {
3609 // IsBlackOrGrey is required because objects are marked as grey for
3610 // the young generation collector while they are black for the full
3611 // MC.);
3612 if (marking_state_->IsBlackOrGrey(heap_object)) {
3613 return KEEP_SLOT;
3614 } else {
3615 return REMOVE_SLOT;
3616 }
3617 }
3618 return KEEP_SLOT;
3619 } else {
3620 DCHECK(!Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object))((void) 0);
3621 }
3622 return REMOVE_SLOT;
3623 }
3624
3625 void UpdateUntypedPointers() {
3626 if (chunk_->slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() != nullptr) {
3627 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
3628 collector == MARK_COMPACTOR,((void) 0)
3629 chunk_->SweepingDone() &&((void) 0)
3630 chunk_->sweeping_slot_set<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() == nullptr)((void) 0);
3631
3632 InvalidatedSlotsFilter filter = InvalidatedSlotsFilter::OldToNew(chunk_);
3633 int slots = RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::Iterate(
3634 chunk_,
3635 [this, &filter](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
3636 if (!filter.IsValid(slot.address())) return REMOVE_SLOT;
3637 return CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(slot);
3638 },
3639 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
3640
3641 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
3642 collector == MARK_COMPACTOR && FLAG_always_promote_young_mc,((void) 0)
3643 slots == 0)((void) 0);
3644
3645 if (slots == 0) {
3646 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet<OLD_TO_NEW>();
3647 }
3648 }
3649
3650 if (chunk_->sweeping_slot_set<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) {
3651 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
3652 collector == MARK_COMPACTOR,((void) 0)
3653 !chunk_->SweepingDone() &&((void) 0)
3654 (chunk_->slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) ==((void) 0)
3655 nullptr)((void) 0);
3656 DCHECK(!chunk_->IsLargePage())((void) 0);
3657
3658 InvalidatedSlotsFilter filter = InvalidatedSlotsFilter::OldToNew(chunk_);
3659 int slots = RememberedSetSweeping::Iterate(
3660 chunk_,
3661 [this, &filter](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
3662 if (!filter.IsValid(slot.address())) return REMOVE_SLOT;
3663 return CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(slot);
3664 },
3665 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
3666
3667 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
3668 collector == MARK_COMPACTOR && FLAG_always_promote_young_mc,((void) 0)
3669 slots == 0)((void) 0);
3670
3671 if (slots == 0) {
3672 chunk_->ReleaseSweepingSlotSet();
3673 }
3674 }
3675
3676 if (chunk_->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_NEW>() != nullptr) {
3677 // The invalidated slots are not needed after old-to-new slots were
3678 // processed.
3679 chunk_->ReleaseInvalidatedSlots<OLD_TO_NEW>();
3680 }
3681
3682 if ((updating_mode_ == RememberedSetUpdatingMode::ALL) &&
3683 (chunk_->slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() != nullptr)) {
3684 InvalidatedSlotsFilter filter = InvalidatedSlotsFilter::OldToOld(chunk_);
3685 const Isolate* isolate = heap_->isolate();
3686 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::Iterate(
3687 chunk_,
3688 [&filter, isolate](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
3689 if (!filter.IsValid(slot.address())) return REMOVE_SLOT;
3690 return UpdateSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
3691 },
3692 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
3693 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet<OLD_TO_OLD>();
3694 }
3695 if ((updating_mode_ == RememberedSetUpdatingMode::ALL) &&
3696 chunk_->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_OLD>() != nullptr) {
3697 // The invalidated slots are not needed after old-to-old slots were
3698 // processsed.
3699 chunk_->ReleaseInvalidatedSlots<OLD_TO_OLD>();
3700 }
3701 }
3702
3703 void UpdateTypedPointers() {
3704 if (chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() !=
3705 nullptr) {
3706 CHECK_NE(chunk_->owner(), heap_->map_space())do { bool _cmp = ::v8::base::CmpNEImpl< typename ::v8::base
::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(chunk_->owner())>::type
, typename ::v8::base::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(heap_->
map_space())>::type>((chunk_->owner()), (heap_->map_space
())); do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(_cmp)), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("Check failed: %s.", "chunk_->owner()" " " "!=" " " "heap_->map_space()"
); } } while (false); } while (false);
3707 const auto check_and_update_old_to_new_slot_fn =
3708 [this](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
3709 return CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(slot);
3710 };
3711 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::IterateTyped(
3712 chunk_, [=](SlotType slot_type, Address slot) {
3713 return UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
3714 heap_, slot_type, slot, check_and_update_old_to_new_slot_fn);
3715 });
3716 }
3717 if ((updating_mode_ == RememberedSetUpdatingMode::ALL) &&
3718 (chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() !=
3719 nullptr)) {
3720 CHECK_NE(chunk_->owner(), heap_->map_space())do { bool _cmp = ::v8::base::CmpNEImpl< typename ::v8::base
::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(chunk_->owner())>::type
, typename ::v8::base::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(heap_->
map_space())>::type>((chunk_->owner()), (heap_->map_space
())); do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(_cmp)), 0))) { V8_Fatal
("Check failed: %s.", "chunk_->owner()" " " "!=" " " "heap_->map_space()"
); } } while (false); } while (false);
3721 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::IterateTyped(chunk_, [=](SlotType slot_type,
3722 Address slot) {
3723 // Using UpdateStrongSlot is OK here, because there are no weak
3724 // typed slots.
3725 const Isolate* isolate = heap_->isolate();
3726 return UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
3727 heap_, slot_type, slot, [isolate](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
3728 return UpdateStrongSlot<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(isolate, slot);
3729 });
3730 });
3731 }
3732 }
3733
3734 Heap* heap_;
3735 MarkingState* marking_state_;
3736 MemoryChunk* chunk_;
3737 RememberedSetUpdatingMode updating_mode_;
3738};
3739
3740UpdatingItem* MarkCompactCollector::CreateToSpaceUpdatingItem(
3741 MemoryChunk* chunk, Address start, Address end) {
3742 return new ToSpaceUpdatingItem<NonAtomicMarkingState>(
3743 chunk, start, end, non_atomic_marking_state());
3744}
3745
3746UpdatingItem* MarkCompactCollector::CreateRememberedSetUpdatingItem(
3747 MemoryChunk* chunk, RememberedSetUpdatingMode updating_mode) {
3748 return new RememberedSetUpdatingItem<NonAtomicMarkingState, MARK_COMPACTOR>(
3749 heap(), non_atomic_marking_state(), chunk, updating_mode);
3750}
3751
3752int MarkCompactCollectorBase::CollectToSpaceUpdatingItems(
3753 ItemParallelJob* job) {
3754 // Seed to space pages.
3755 const Address space_start = heap()->new_space()->first_allocatable_address();
3756 const Address space_end = heap()->new_space()->top();
3757 int pages = 0;
3758 for (Page* page : PageRange(space_start, space_end)) {
3759 Address start =
3760 page->Contains(space_start) ? space_start : page->area_start();
3761 Address end = page->Contains(space_end) ? space_end : page->area_end();
3762 job->AddItem(CreateToSpaceUpdatingItem(page, start, end));
3763 pages++;
3764 }
3765 if (pages == 0) return 0;
3766 return NumberOfParallelToSpacePointerUpdateTasks(pages);
3767}
3768
3769template <typename IterateableSpace>
3770int MarkCompactCollectorBase::CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
3771 ItemParallelJob* job, IterateableSpace* space,
3772 RememberedSetUpdatingMode mode) {
3773 int pages = 0;
3774 for (MemoryChunk* chunk : *space) {
3775 const bool contains_old_to_old_slots =
3776 chunk->slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD>() != nullptr ||
3777 chunk->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD>() != nullptr;
3778 const bool contains_old_to_new_slots =
3779 chunk->slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW>() != nullptr ||
3780 chunk->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW>() != nullptr;
3781 const bool contains_old_to_new_sweeping_slots =
3782 chunk->sweeping_slot_set() != nullptr;
3783 const bool contains_old_to_old_invalidated_slots =
3784 chunk->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_OLD>() != nullptr;
3785 const bool contains_old_to_new_invalidated_slots =
3786 chunk->invalidated_slots<OLD_TO_NEW>() != nullptr;
3787 if (!contains_old_to_new_slots && !contains_old_to_new_sweeping_slots &&
3788 !contains_old_to_old_slots && !contains_old_to_old_invalidated_slots &&
3789 !contains_old_to_new_invalidated_slots)
3790 continue;
3791 if (mode == RememberedSetUpdatingMode::ALL || contains_old_to_new_slots ||
3792 contains_old_to_new_sweeping_slots ||
3793 contains_old_to_old_invalidated_slots ||
3794 contains_old_to_new_invalidated_slots) {
3795 job->AddItem(CreateRememberedSetUpdatingItem(chunk, mode));
3796 pages++;
3797 }
3798 }
3799 return pages;
3800}
3801
3802class EphemeronTableUpdatingItem : public UpdatingItem {
3803 public:
3804 enum EvacuationState { kRegular, kAborted };
3805
3806 explicit EphemeronTableUpdatingItem(Heap* heap) : heap_(heap) {}
3807 ~EphemeronTableUpdatingItem() override = default;
3808
3809 void Process() override {
3810 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3811 = 0

); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3811
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3811

, "EphemeronTableUpdatingItem::Process", h); }
3811 "EphemeronTableUpdatingItem::Process")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic3811 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3811
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic3811
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer3811
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811, "EphemeronTableUpdatingItem::Process"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer3811 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled3811
, "EphemeronTableUpdatingItem::Process", h); };
3812
3813 for (auto it = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.begin();
3814 it != heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.end();) {
3815 EphemeronHashTable table = it->first;
3816 auto& indices = it->second;
3817 if (table.map_word().IsForwardingAddress()) {
3818 // The table has moved, and RecordMigratedSlotVisitor::VisitEphemeron
3819 // inserts entries for the moved table into ephemeron_remembered_set_.
3820 it = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.erase(it);
3821 continue;
3822 }
3823 DCHECK(table.map().IsMap())((void) 0);
3824 DCHECK(table.Object::IsEphemeronHashTable())((void) 0);
3825 for (auto iti = indices.begin(); iti != indices.end();) {
3826 // EphemeronHashTable keys must be heap objects.
3827 HeapObjectSlot key_slot(table.RawFieldOfElementAt(
3828 EphemeronHashTable::EntryToIndex(InternalIndex(*iti))));
3829 HeapObject key = key_slot.ToHeapObject();
3830 MapWord map_word = key.map_word();
3831 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
3832 key = map_word.ToForwardingAddress();
3833 key_slot.StoreHeapObject(key);
3834 }
3835 if (!heap_->InYoungGeneration(key)) {
3836 iti = indices.erase(iti);
3837 } else {
3838 ++iti;
3839 }
3840 }
3841 if (indices.size() == 0) {
3842 it = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set_.erase(it);
3843 } else {
3844 ++it;
3845 }
3846 }
3847 }
3848
3849 private:
3850 Heap* const heap_;
3851};

3904 // byte length which is potentially a HeapNumber.

3941}
3942
3943void MarkCompactCollector::ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidate(
3944 HeapObject failed_object, MemoryChunk* chunk) {
3945 base::MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
3946
3947 aborted_evacuation_candidates_.push_back(
3948 std::make_pair(failed_object, static_cast<Page*>(chunk)));
3949}
3950
3951void MarkCompactCollector::PostProcessEvacuationCandidates() {
3952 for (auto object_and_page : aborted_evacuation_candidates_) {
3953 HeapObject failed_object = object_and_page.first;
3954 Page* page = object_and_page.second;
3955 page->SetFlag(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED);
3956 // Aborted compaction page. We have to record slots here, since we
3957 // might not have recorded them in first place.
3958
3959 // Remove outdated slots.
3960 RememberedSetSweeping::RemoveRange(page, page->address(),
3961 failed_object.address(),
3962 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
3963 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRange(page, page->address(),
3964 failed_object.address(),
3965 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
3966 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRangeTyped(page, page->address(),
3967 failed_object.address());
3968
3969 // Remove invalidated slots.
3970 if (failed_object.address() > page->area_start()) {
3971 InvalidatedSlotsCleanup old_to_new_cleanup =
3972 InvalidatedSlotsCleanup::OldToNew(page);
3973 old_to_new_cleanup.Free(page->area_start(), failed_object.address());
3974 }
3975
3976 // Recompute live bytes.
3977 LiveObjectVisitor::RecomputeLiveBytes(page, non_atomic_marking_state());
3978 // Re-record slots.
3979 EvacuateRecordOnlyVisitor record_visitor(heap());
3980 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitBlackObjectsNoFail(page, non_atomic_marking_state(),
3981 &record_visitor,
3982 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
3983 // Array buffers will be processed during pointer updating.
3984 }
3985 const int aborted_pages =
3986 static_cast<int>(aborted_evacuation_candidates_.size());
3987 int aborted_pages_verified = 0;
3988 for (Page* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
3989 if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) {
3990 // After clearing the evacuation candidate flag the page is again in a
3991 // regular state.
3992 p->ClearEvacuationCandidate();
3993 aborted_pages_verified++;
3994 } else {
3995 DCHECK(p->IsEvacuationCandidate())((void) 0);
3996 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone())((void) 0);
3997 p->owner()->memory_chunk_list().Remove(p);
3998 }
3999 }
4000 DCHECK_EQ(aborted_pages_verified, aborted_pages)((void) 0);
4001 if (FLAG_trace_evacuation && (aborted_pages > 0)) {
4002 PrintIsolate(isolate(), "%8.0f ms: evacuation: aborted=%d\n",
4003 isolate()->time_millis_since_init(), aborted_pages);
4004 }
4005}
4006
4007void MarkCompactCollector::ReleaseEvacuationCandidates() {
4008 for (Page* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4009 if (!p->IsEvacuationCandidate()) continue;
4010 PagedSpace* space = static_cast<PagedSpace*>(p->owner());
4011 non_atomic_marking_state()->SetLiveBytes(p, 0);
4012 CHECK(p->SweepingDone())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(p->SweepingDone())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "p->SweepingDone()"); } } while
(false);
4013 space->ReleasePage(p);
4014 }
4015 old_space_evacuation_pages_.clear();
4016 compacting_ = false;
4017}
4018
4019void MarkCompactCollector::StartSweepSpace(PagedSpace* space) {
4020 space->ClearAllocatorState();
4021
4022 int will_be_swept = 0;
4023 bool unused_page_present = false;
4024
4025 // Loop needs to support deletion if live bytes == 0 for a page.
4026 for (auto it = space->begin(); it != space->end();) {
4027 Page* p = *(it++);
4028 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone())((void) 0);
4029
4030 if (p->IsEvacuationCandidate()) {
4031 // Will be processed in Evacuate.
4032 DCHECK(!evacuation_candidates_.empty())((void) 0);
4033 continue;
4034 }
4035
4036 // One unused page is kept, all further are released before sweeping them.
4037 if (non_atomic_marking_state()->live_bytes(p) == 0) {
4038 if (unused_page_present) {
4039 if (FLAG_gc_verbose) {
4040 PrintIsolate(isolate(), "sweeping: released page: %p",
4041 static_cast<void*>(p));
4042 }
4043 space->memory_chunk_list().Remove(p);
4044 space->ReleasePage(p);
4045 continue;
4046 }
4047 unused_page_present = true;
4048 }
4049
4050 sweeper()->AddPage(space->identity(), p, Sweeper::REGULAR);
4051 will_be_swept++;
4052 }
4053
4054 if (FLAG_gc_verbose) {
4055 PrintIsolate(isolate(), "sweeping: space=%s initialized_for_sweeping=%d",
4056 space->name(), will_be_swept);
4057 }
4058}
4059
4060void MarkCompactCollector::StartSweepSpaces() {
4061 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MC_SWEEP); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer(
), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4061
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4061
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4061
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4061
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4061
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4061, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4062#ifdef DEBUG
4063 state_ = SWEEP_SPACES;
4064#endif
4065
4066 {
4067 {
4068 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap()->tracer(),
4069 GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_OLD);
4070 StartSweepSpace(heap()->old_space());
4071 }
4072 {
4073 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap()->tracer(),
4074 GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_CODE);
4075 StartSweepSpace(heap()->code_space());
4076 }
4077 {
4078 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap()->tracer(),
4079 GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_MAP);
4080 StartSweepSpace(heap()->map_space());
4081 }
4082 sweeper()->StartSweeping();
4083 }
4084}
4085
4086#ifdef ENABLE_MINOR_MC1
4087
4088namespace {
4089
4090#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
4091
4092class YoungGenerationMarkingVerifier : public MarkingVerifier {
4093 public:
4094 explicit YoungGenerationMarkingVerifier(Heap* heap)
4095 : MarkingVerifier(heap),
4096 marking_state_(
4097 heap->minor_mark_compact_collector()->non_atomic_marking_state()) {}
4098
4099 ConcurrentBitmap<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>* bitmap(
4100 const MemoryChunk* chunk) override {
4101 return marking_state_->bitmap(chunk);
4102 }
4103
4104 bool IsMarked(HeapObject object) override {
4105 return marking_state_->IsGrey(object);
4106 }
4107
4108 bool IsBlackOrGrey(HeapObject object) override {
4109 return marking_state_->IsBlackOrGrey(object);
4110 }
4111
4112 void Run() override {
4113 VerifyRoots();
4114 VerifyMarking(heap_->new_space());
4115 }
4116
4117 protected:
4118 void VerifyPointers(ObjectSlot start, ObjectSlot end) override {
4119 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4120 }
4121
4122 void VerifyPointers(MaybeObjectSlot start, MaybeObjectSlot end) override {
4123 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4124 }
4125
4126 void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
4127 Code target = Code::GetCodeFromTargetAddress(rinfo->target_address());
4128 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(target);
4129 }
4130 void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
4131 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(rinfo->target_object());
4132 }
4133 void VerifyRootPointers(FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
4134 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4135 }
4136
4137 private:
4138 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VerifyHeapObjectImpl(HeapObject heap_object) {
4139 CHECK_IMPLIES(Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object), IsMarked(heap_object))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object
)) || (IsMarked(heap_object)))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object)" " implies " "IsMarked(heap_object)"
); } } while (false);
4140 }
4141
4142 template <typename TSlot>
4143 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VerifyPointersImpl(TSlot start, TSlot end) {
4144 for (TSlot slot = start; slot < end; ++slot) {
4145 typename TSlot::TObject object = *slot;
4146 HeapObject heap_object;
4147 // Minor MC treats weak references as strong.
4148 if (object.GetHeapObject(&heap_object)) {
4149 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(heap_object);
4150 }
4151 }
4152 }
4153
4154 MinorMarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state_;
4155};
4156
4157class YoungGenerationEvacuationVerifier : public EvacuationVerifier {
4158 public:
4159 explicit YoungGenerationEvacuationVerifier(Heap* heap)
4160 : EvacuationVerifier(heap) {}
4161
4162 void Run() override {
4163 VerifyRoots();
4164 VerifyEvacuation(heap_->new_space());
4165 VerifyEvacuation(heap_->old_space());
4166 VerifyEvacuation(heap_->code_space());
4167 VerifyEvacuation(heap_->map_space());
4168 }
4169
4170 protected:
4171 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VerifyHeapObjectImpl(HeapObject heap_object) {
4172 CHECK_IMPLIES(Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object),do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object
)) || (Heap::InToPage(heap_object)))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object)" " implies " "Heap::InToPage(heap_object)"
); } } while (false)
4173 Heap::InToPage(heap_object))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!(Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object
)) || (Heap::InToPage(heap_object)))), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s."
, "Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object)" " implies " "Heap::InToPage(heap_object)"
); } } while (false);
4174 }
4175
4176 template <typename TSlot>
4177 void VerifyPointersImpl(TSlot start, TSlot end) {
4178 for (TSlot current = start; current < end; ++current) {
4179 typename TSlot::TObject object = *current;
4180 HeapObject heap_object;
4181 if (object.GetHeapObject(&heap_object)) {
4182 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(heap_object);
4183 }
4184 }
4185 }
4186
4187 void VerifyPointers(ObjectSlot start, ObjectSlot end) override {
4188 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4189 }
4190 void VerifyPointers(MaybeObjectSlot start, MaybeObjectSlot end) override {
4191 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4192 }
4193 void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
4194 Code target = Code::GetCodeFromTargetAddress(rinfo->target_address());
4195 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(target);
4196 }
4197 void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) override {
4198 VerifyHeapObjectImpl(rinfo->target_object());
4199 }
4200 void VerifyRootPointers(FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
4201 VerifyPointersImpl(start, end);
4202 }
4203};
4204
4205#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
4206
4207bool IsUnmarkedObjectForYoungGeneration(Heap* heap, FullObjectSlot p) {
4208 DCHECK_IMPLIES(Heap::InYoungGeneration(*p), Heap::InToPage(*p))((void) 0);
4209 return Heap::InYoungGeneration(*p) && !heap->minor_mark_compact_collector()
4210 ->non_atomic_marking_state()
4211 ->IsGrey(HeapObject::cast(*p));
4212}
4213
4214} // namespace
4215
4216class YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor final
4217 : public NewSpaceVisitor<YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor> {
4218 public:
4219 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor(
4220 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingState* marking_state,
4221 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist* global_worklist, int task_id)
4222 : worklist_(global_worklist, task_id), marking_state_(marking_state) {}
4223
4224 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot start,
4225 ObjectSlot end) final {
4226 VisitPointersImpl(host, start, end);
4227 }
4228
4229 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointers(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot start,
4230 MaybeObjectSlot end) final {
4231 VisitPointersImpl(host, start, end);
4232 }
4233
4234 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, ObjectSlot slot) final {
4235 VisitPointerImpl(host, slot);
4236 }
4237
4238 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointer(HeapObject host, MaybeObjectSlot slot) final {
4239 VisitPointerImpl(host, slot);
4240 }
4241
4242 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {
4243 // Code objects are not expected in new space.
4244 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
4245 }
4246
4247 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {
4248 // Code objects are not expected in new space.
4249 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
4250 }
4251
4252 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) int VisitJSArrayBuffer(Map map, JSArrayBuffer object) {
4253 object.YoungMarkExtension();
4254 int size = JSArrayBuffer::BodyDescriptor::SizeOf(map, object);
4255 JSArrayBuffer::BodyDescriptor::IterateBody(map, object, size, this);
4256 return size;
4257 }
4258
4259 private:
4260 template <typename TSlot>
4261 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointersImpl(HeapObject host, TSlot start, TSlot end) {
4262 for (TSlot slot = start; slot < end; ++slot) {
4263 VisitPointer(host, slot);
4264 }
4265 }
4266
4267 template <typename TSlot>
4268 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void VisitPointerImpl(HeapObject host, TSlot slot) {
4269 typename TSlot::TObject target = *slot;
4270 if (Heap::InYoungGeneration(target)) {
4271 // Treat weak references as strong.
4272 // TODO(marja): Proper weakness handling for minor-mcs.
4273 HeapObject target_object = target.GetHeapObject();
4274 MarkObjectViaMarkingWorklist(target_object);
4275 }
4276 }
4277
4278 inline void MarkObjectViaMarkingWorklist(HeapObject object) {
4279 if (marking_state_->WhiteToGrey(object)) {
4280 // Marking deque overflow is unsupported for the young generation.
4281 CHECK(worklist_.Push(object))do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(worklist_.Push(object))), 0))
) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "worklist_.Push(object)"); }
} while (false);
4282 }
4283 }
4284
4285 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist::View worklist_;
4286 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingState* marking_state_;
4287};
4288
4289void MinorMarkCompactCollector::SetUp() {}
4290
4291void MinorMarkCompactCollector::TearDown() {}
4292
4293MinorMarkCompactCollector::MinorMarkCompactCollector(Heap* heap)
4294 : MarkCompactCollectorBase(heap),
4295 worklist_(new MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist()),
4296 main_marking_visitor_(new YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor(
4297 marking_state(), worklist_, kMainMarker)),
4298 page_parallel_job_semaphore_(0) {
4299 static_assert(
4300 kNumMarkers <= MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist::kMaxNumTasks,
4301 "more marker tasks than marking deque can handle");
4302}
4303
4304MinorMarkCompactCollector::~MinorMarkCompactCollector() {
4305 delete worklist_;
4306 delete main_marking_visitor_;
4307}
4308
4309int MinorMarkCompactCollector::NumberOfParallelMarkingTasks(int pages) {
4310 DCHECK_GT(pages, 0)((void) 0);
4311 if (!FLAG_minor_mc_parallel_marking) return 1;
4312 // Pages are not private to markers but we can still use them to estimate the
4313 // amount of marking that is required.
4314 const int kPagesPerTask = 2;
4315 const int wanted_tasks = Max(1, pages / kPagesPerTask);
4316 return Min(NumberOfAvailableCores(),
4317 Min(wanted_tasks,
4318 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist::kMaxNumTasks));
4319}
4320
4321void MinorMarkCompactCollector::CleanupSweepToIteratePages() {
4322 for (Page* p : sweep_to_iterate_pages_) {
4323 if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::SWEEP_TO_ITERATE)) {
4324 p->ClearFlag(Page::SWEEP_TO_ITERATE);
4325 non_atomic_marking_state()->ClearLiveness(p);
4326 }
4327 }
4328 sweep_to_iterate_pages_.clear();
4329}
4330
4331void MinorMarkCompactCollector::SweepArrayBufferExtensions() {
4332 heap_->array_buffer_sweeper()->RequestSweepYoung();
4333}
4334
4335class YoungGenerationMigrationObserver final : public MigrationObserver {
4336 public:
4337 YoungGenerationMigrationObserver(Heap* heap,
4338 MarkCompactCollector* mark_compact_collector)
4339 : MigrationObserver(heap),
4340 mark_compact_collector_(mark_compact_collector) {}
4341
4342 inline void Move(AllocationSpace dest, HeapObject src, HeapObject dst,
4343 int size) final {
4344 // Migrate color to old generation marking in case the object survived young
4345 // generation garbage collection.
4346 if (heap_->incremental_marking()->IsMarking()) {
4347 DCHECK(((void) 0)
4348 heap_->incremental_marking()->atomic_marking_state()->IsWhite(dst))((void) 0);
4349 heap_->incremental_marking()->TransferColor(src, dst);
4350 }
4351 }
4352
4353 protected:
4354 base::Mutex mutex_;
4355 MarkCompactCollector* mark_compact_collector_;
4356};
4357
4358class YoungGenerationRecordMigratedSlotVisitor final
4359 : public RecordMigratedSlotVisitor {
4360 public:
4361 explicit YoungGenerationRecordMigratedSlotVisitor(
4362 MarkCompactCollector* collector)
4363 : RecordMigratedSlotVisitor(collector, nullptr) {}
4364
4365 void VisitCodeTarget(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final { UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code"); }
4366 void VisitEmbeddedPointer(Code host, RelocInfo* rinfo) final {
4367 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
4368 }
4369
4370 void MarkArrayBufferExtensionPromoted(HeapObject object) final {
4371 if (!object.IsJSArrayBuffer()) return;
4372 JSArrayBuffer::cast(object).YoungMarkExtensionPromoted();
4373 }
4374
4375 private:
4376 // Only record slots for host objects that are considered as live by the full
4377 // collector.
4378 inline bool IsLive(HeapObject object) {
4379 return collector_->non_atomic_marking_state()->IsBlack(object);
4380 }
4381
4382 inline void RecordMigratedSlot(HeapObject host, MaybeObject value,
4383 Address slot) final {
4384 if (value->IsStrongOrWeak()) {
4385 BasicMemoryChunk* p = BasicMemoryChunk::FromAddress(value.ptr());
4386 if (p->InYoungGeneration()) {
4387 DCHECK_IMPLIES(((void) 0)
4388 p->IsToPage(),((void) 0)
4389 p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION) || p->IsLargePage())((void) 0);
4390 MemoryChunk* chunk = MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(host);
4391 DCHECK(chunk->SweepingDone())((void) 0);
4392 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::Insert<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(chunk, slot);
4393 } else if (p->IsEvacuationCandidate() && IsLive(host)) {
4394 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::Insert<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(
4395 MemoryChunk::FromHeapObject(host), slot);
4396 }
4397 }
4398 }
4399};
4400
4401void MinorMarkCompactCollector::UpdatePointersAfterEvacuation() {
4402 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4403 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4403
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4403
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4403
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4403
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
4403 GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4403 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4403
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4403
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4403
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4403
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4403, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4404
4405 PointersUpdatingVisitor updating_visitor(isolate());
4406 ItemParallelJob updating_job(isolate()->cancelable_task_manager(),
4407 &page_parallel_job_semaphore_);
4408
4409 // Create batches of global handles.
4410 const int to_space_tasks = CollectToSpaceUpdatingItems(&updating_job);
4411 int remembered_set_pages = 0;
4412 remembered_set_pages += CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
4413 &updating_job, heap()->old_space(),
4414 RememberedSetUpdatingMode::OLD_TO_NEW_ONLY);
4415 remembered_set_pages += CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
4416 &updating_job, heap()->code_space(),
4417 RememberedSetUpdatingMode::OLD_TO_NEW_ONLY);
4418 remembered_set_pages += CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
4419 &updating_job, heap()->map_space(),
4420 RememberedSetUpdatingMode::OLD_TO_NEW_ONLY);
4421 remembered_set_pages += CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
4422 &updating_job, heap()->lo_space(),
4423 RememberedSetUpdatingMode::OLD_TO_NEW_ONLY);
4424 remembered_set_pages += CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
4425 &updating_job, heap()->code_lo_space(),
4426 RememberedSetUpdatingMode::OLD_TO_NEW_ONLY);
4427 const int remembered_set_tasks =
4428 remembered_set_pages == 0 ? 0
4429 : NumberOfParallelPointerUpdateTasks(
4430 remembered_set_pages, old_to_new_slots_);
4431 const int num_tasks = Max(to_space_tasks, remembered_set_tasks);
4432 for (int i = 0; i < num_tasks; i++) {
4433 updating_job.AddTask(new PointersUpdatingTask(
4434 isolate(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_PARALLEL,
4435 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::
4436 MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS));
4437 }
4438
4439 {
4440 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_TO_NEW_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope
gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static
v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4441 = 0; const
uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441
= reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load
(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4441))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441
) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441 = v8::internal
::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled
("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"); v8::base
::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4441), (reinterpret_cast
<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4441
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4441
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags

::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
4441 GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_TO_NEW_ROOTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_TO_NEW_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope

::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4442 heap()->IterateRoots(&updating_visitor,
4443 base::EnumSet<SkipRoot>{SkipRoot::kExternalStringTable,
4444 SkipRoot::kOldGeneration});
4445 }
4446 {
4447 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::

.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4448, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4449 updating_job.Run();
4450 }
4451
4452 {
4453 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_WEAK); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope

), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454

(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4454
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
4454 GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_WEAK)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_WEAK); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
