"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4454
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4454
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4454
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4454, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4455
4456 EvacuationWeakObjectRetainer evacuation_object_retainer;
4457 heap()->ProcessWeakListRoots(&evacuation_object_retainer);
4458
4459 // Update pointers from external string table.
4460 heap()->UpdateYoungReferencesInExternalStringTable(
4461 &UpdateReferenceInExternalStringTableEntry);
4462 }
4463}
4464
4465class MinorMarkCompactCollector::RootMarkingVisitor : public RootVisitor {
4466 public:
4467 explicit RootMarkingVisitor(MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector)
4468 : collector_(collector) {}
4469
4470 void VisitRootPointer(Root root, const char* description,
4471 FullObjectSlot p) final {
4472 MarkObjectByPointer(p);
4473 }
4474
4475 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
4476 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) final {
4477 for (FullObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
4478 MarkObjectByPointer(p);
4479 }
4480 }
4481
4482 private:
4483 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) void MarkObjectByPointer(FullObjectSlot p) {
4484 if (!(*p).IsHeapObject()) return;
4485 collector_->MarkRootObject(HeapObject::cast(*p));
4486 }
4487 MinorMarkCompactCollector* const collector_;
4488};
4489
4490void MinorMarkCompactCollector::CollectGarbage() {
4491 {
4492 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_SWEEPING)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_SWEEPING); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4492
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4492
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4492
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4492
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4492
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4492, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4493 heap()->mark_compact_collector()->sweeper()->EnsureIterabilityCompleted();
4494 CleanupSweepToIteratePages();
4495 }
4496
4497 heap()->array_buffer_sweeper()->EnsureFinished();
4498
4499 MarkLiveObjects();
4500 ClearNonLiveReferences();
4501#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
4502 if (FLAG_verify_heap) {
4503 YoungGenerationMarkingVerifier verifier(heap());
4504 verifier.Run();
4505 }
4506#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
4507
4508 Evacuate();
4509#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
4510 if (FLAG_verify_heap) {
4511 YoungGenerationEvacuationVerifier verifier(heap());
4512 verifier.Run();
4513 }
4514#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
4515
4516 {
4517 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARKING_DEQUE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARKING_DEQUE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4517 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4517
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4517
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4517
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4517
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4517, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4518 heap()->incremental_marking()->UpdateMarkingWorklistAfterScavenge();
4519 }
4520
4521 {
4522 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_RESET_LIVENESS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_RESET_LIVENESS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4522 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4522
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4522
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4522
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4522
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4522, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4523 for (Page* p :
4524 PageRange(heap()->new_space()->from_space().first_page(), nullptr)) {
4525 DCHECK(!p->IsFlagSet(Page::SWEEP_TO_ITERATE))((void) 0);
4526 non_atomic_marking_state()->ClearLiveness(p);
4527 if (FLAG_concurrent_marking) {
4528 // Ensure that concurrent marker does not track pages that are
4529 // going to be unmapped.
4530 heap()->concurrent_marking()->ClearMemoryChunkData(p);
4531 }
4532 }
4533 // Since we promote all surviving large objects immediatelly, all remaining
4534 // large objects must be dead.
4535 // TODO(ulan): Don't free all as soon as we have an intermediate generation.
4536 heap()->new_lo_space()->FreeDeadObjects([](HeapObject) { return true; });
4537 }
4538
4539 SweepArrayBufferExtensions();
4540}
4541
4542void MinorMarkCompactCollector::MakeIterable(
4543 Page* p, MarkingTreatmentMode marking_mode,
4544 FreeSpaceTreatmentMode free_space_mode) {
4545 CHECK(!p->IsLargePage())do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!(!(!p->IsLargePage())), 0))) {
V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "!p->IsLargePage()"); } } while
(false);
4546 // We have to clear the full collectors markbits for the areas that we
4547 // remove here.
4548 MarkCompactCollector* full_collector = heap()->mark_compact_collector();
4549 Address free_start = p->area_start();
4550
4551 for (auto object_and_size :
4552 LiveObjectRange<kGreyObjects>(p, marking_state()->bitmap(p))) {
4553 HeapObject const object = object_and_size.first;
4554 DCHECK(non_atomic_marking_state()->IsGrey(object))((void) 0);
4555 Address free_end = object.address();
4556 if (free_end != free_start) {
4557 CHECK_GT(free_end, free_start)do { bool _cmp = ::v8::base::CmpGTImpl< typename ::v8::base
::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(free_end)>::type, typename
::v8::base::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(free_start)>::type
>((free_end), (free_start)); do { if ((__builtin_expect(!!
(!(_cmp)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "free_end" " "
">" " " "free_start"); } } while (false); } while (false);
4558 size_t size = static_cast<size_t>(free_end - free_start);
4559 full_collector->non_atomic_marking_state()->bitmap(p)->ClearRange(
4560 p->AddressToMarkbitIndex(free_start),
4561 p->AddressToMarkbitIndex(free_end));
4562 if (free_space_mode == ZAP_FREE_SPACE) {
4563 ZapCode(free_start, size);
4564 }
4565 p->heap()->CreateFillerObjectAt(free_start, static_cast<int>(size),
4566 ClearRecordedSlots::kNo);
4567 }
4568 Map map = object.synchronized_map();
4569 int size = object.SizeFromMap(map);
4570 free_start = free_end + size;
4571 }
4572
4573 if (free_start != p->area_end()) {
4574 CHECK_GT(p->area_end(), free_start)do { bool _cmp = ::v8::base::CmpGTImpl< typename ::v8::base
::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(p->area_end())>::type, typename
::v8::base::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(free_start)>::type
>((p->area_end()), (free_start)); do { if ((__builtin_expect
(!!(!(_cmp)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "p->area_end()"
" " ">" " " "free_start"); } } while (false); } while (false
);
4575 size_t size = static_cast<size_t>(p->area_end() - free_start);
4576 full_collector->non_atomic_marking_state()->bitmap(p)->ClearRange(
4577 p->AddressToMarkbitIndex(free_start),
4578 p->AddressToMarkbitIndex(p->area_end()));
4579 if (free_space_mode == ZAP_FREE_SPACE) {
4580 ZapCode(free_start, size);
4581 }
4582 p->heap()->CreateFillerObjectAt(free_start, static_cast<int>(size),
4583 ClearRecordedSlots::kNo);
4584 }
4585
4586 if (marking_mode == MarkingTreatmentMode::CLEAR) {
4587 non_atomic_marking_state()->ClearLiveness(p);
4588 p->ClearFlag(Page::SWEEP_TO_ITERATE);
4589 }
4590}
4591
4592namespace {
4593
4594// Helper class for pruning the string table.
4595class YoungGenerationExternalStringTableCleaner : public RootVisitor {
4596 public:
4597 YoungGenerationExternalStringTableCleaner(
4598 MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector)
4599 : heap_(collector->heap()),
4600 marking_state_(collector->non_atomic_marking_state()) {}
4601
4602 void VisitRootPointers(Root root, const char* description,
4603 FullObjectSlot start, FullObjectSlot end) override {
4604 DCHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(root),((void) 0)
4605 static_cast<int>(Root::kExternalStringsTable))((void) 0);
4606 // Visit all HeapObject pointers in [start, end).
4607 for (FullObjectSlot p = start; p < end; ++p) {
4608 Object o = *p;
4609 if (o.IsHeapObject()) {
4610 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(o);
4611 if (marking_state_->IsWhite(heap_object)) {
4612 if (o.IsExternalString()) {
4613 heap_->FinalizeExternalString(String::cast(*p));
4614 } else {
4615 // The original external string may have been internalized.
4616 DCHECK(o.IsThinString())((void) 0);
4617 }
4618 // Set the entry to the_hole_value (as deleted).
4619 p.store(ReadOnlyRoots(heap_).the_hole_value());
4620 }
4621 }
4622 }
4623 }
4624
4625 private:
4626 Heap* heap_;
4627 MinorMarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state_;
4628};
4629
4630// Marked young generation objects and all old generation objects will be
4631// retained.
4632class MinorMarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer : public WeakObjectRetainer {
4633 public:
4634 explicit MinorMarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer(
4635 MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector)
4636 : marking_state_(collector->non_atomic_marking_state()) {}
4637
4638 Object RetainAs(Object object) override {
4639 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(object);
4640 if (!Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object)) return object;
4641
4642 // Young generation marking only marks to grey instead of black.
4643 DCHECK(!marking_state_->IsBlack(heap_object))((void) 0);
4644 if (marking_state_->IsGrey(heap_object)) {
4645 return object;
4646 }
4647 return Object();
4648 }
4649
4650 private:
4651 MinorMarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state_;
4652};
4653
4654} // namespace
4655
4656void MinorMarkCompactCollector::ClearNonLiveReferences() {
4657 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_CLEAR)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_CLEAR); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4657
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4657
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4657
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4657

(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4657
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4657, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4658
4659 {
4660 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_CLEAR_STRING_TABLE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_CLEAR_STRING_TABLE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope

"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4660
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4660
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4660
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4660
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4660, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4660
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4660, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4661 // Internalized strings are always stored in old space, so there is no need
4662 // to clean them here.
4663 YoungGenerationExternalStringTableCleaner external_visitor(this);
4664 heap()->external_string_table_.IterateYoung(&external_visitor);
4665 heap()->external_string_table_.CleanUpYoung();
4666 }
4667
4668 {
4669 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_CLEAR_WEAK_LISTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_CLEAR_WEAK_LISTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4669 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4669
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4669
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4669
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4669
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4669, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4670 // Process the weak references.
4671 MinorMarkCompactWeakObjectRetainer retainer(this);
4672 heap()->ProcessYoungWeakReferences(&retainer);
4673 }
4674}
4675
4676void MinorMarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePrologue() {
4677 NewSpace* new_space = heap()->new_space();
4678 // Append the list of new space pages to be processed.
4679 for (Page* p :
4680 PageRange(new_space->first_allocatable_address(), new_space->top())) {
4681 new_space_evacuation_pages_.push_back(p);
4682 }
4683
4684 new_space->Flip();
4685 new_space->ResetLinearAllocationArea();
4686
4687 heap()->new_lo_space()->Flip();
4688 heap()->new_lo_space()->ResetPendingObject();
4689}
4690
4691void MinorMarkCompactCollector::EvacuateEpilogue() {
4692 heap()->new_space()->set_age_mark(heap()->new_space()->top());
4693 // Give pages that are queued to be freed back to the OS.
4694 heap()->memory_allocator()->unmapper()->FreeQueuedChunks();
4695}
4696
4697UpdatingItem* MinorMarkCompactCollector::CreateToSpaceUpdatingItem(
4698 MemoryChunk* chunk, Address start, Address end) {
4699 return new ToSpaceUpdatingItem<NonAtomicMarkingState>(
4700 chunk, start, end, non_atomic_marking_state());
4701}
4702
4703UpdatingItem* MinorMarkCompactCollector::CreateRememberedSetUpdatingItem(
4704 MemoryChunk* chunk, RememberedSetUpdatingMode updating_mode) {
4705 return new RememberedSetUpdatingItem<NonAtomicMarkingState,
4706 MINOR_MARK_COMPACTOR>(
4707 heap(), non_atomic_marking_state(), chunk, updating_mode);
4708}
4709
4710class MarkingItem;
4711class PageMarkingItem;
4712class RootMarkingItem;
4713class YoungGenerationMarkingTask;
4714
4715class MarkingItem : public ItemParallelJob::Item {
4716 public:
4717 ~MarkingItem() override = default;
4718 virtual void Process(YoungGenerationMarkingTask* task) = 0;
4719};
4720
4721class YoungGenerationMarkingTask : public ItemParallelJob::Task {
4722 public:
4723 YoungGenerationMarkingTask(
4724 Isolate* isolate, MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector,
4725 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist* global_worklist, int task_id)
4726 : ItemParallelJob::Task(isolate),
4727 collector_(collector),
4728 marking_worklist_(global_worklist, task_id),
4729 marking_state_(collector->marking_state()),
4730 visitor_(marking_state_, global_worklist, task_id) {
4731 local_live_bytes_.reserve(isolate->heap()->new_space()->Capacity() /
4732 Page::kPageSize);
4733 }
4734
4735 void RunInParallel(Runner runner) override {
4736 if (runner == Runner::kForeground) {
4737 TRACE_GC(collector_->heap()->tracer(),GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_PARALLEL); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(collector_
->heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base
::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4738 = 0; const uint8_t
* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
= reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load
(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4738))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738 = v8::internal
::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled
("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"); v8::base
::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4738), (reinterpret_cast
<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4738
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4738
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); }
4738 GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK_PARALLEL)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_PARALLEL); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(collector_
->heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base
::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4738 = 0; const uint8_t
* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
= reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load
(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4738))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738 = v8::internal
::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled
("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"); v8::base
::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4738), (reinterpret_cast
<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4738
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4738
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4738, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4739 ProcessItems();
4740 } else {
4741 TRACE_BACKGROUND_GC(WorkerThreadRuntimeCallStatsScope runtime_call_stats_scope( collector_
->heap()->tracer()->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats
()); GCTracer::BackgroundScope background_scope(collector_->
heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
, runtime_call_stats_scope.Get()); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4743 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4743
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743, GCTracer::BackgroundScope
::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing
::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4743 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
, GCTracer::BackgroundScope::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::
MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING), h); }
4742 collector_->heap()->tracer(),WorkerThreadRuntimeCallStatsScope runtime_call_stats_scope( collector_
->heap()->tracer()->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats
()); GCTracer::BackgroundScope background_scope(collector_->
heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
, runtime_call_stats_scope.Get()); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4743 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4743
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743, GCTracer::BackgroundScope
::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing
::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4743 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
, GCTracer::BackgroundScope::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::
MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING), h); }
4743 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING)WorkerThreadRuntimeCallStatsScope runtime_call_stats_scope( collector_
->heap()->tracer()->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats
()); GCTracer::BackgroundScope background_scope(collector_->
heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
, runtime_call_stats_scope.Get()); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4743 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4743
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4743
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743, GCTracer::BackgroundScope
::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING
), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing
::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4743 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4743
, GCTracer::BackgroundScope::Name(GCTracer::BackgroundScope::
MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_MARKING), h); };
4744 ProcessItems();
4745 }
4746 }
4747
4748 void MarkObject(Object object) {
4749 if (!Heap::InYoungGeneration(object)) return;
4750 HeapObject heap_object = HeapObject::cast(object);
4751 if (marking_state_->WhiteToGrey(heap_object)) {
4752 const int size = visitor_.Visit(heap_object);
4753 IncrementLiveBytes(heap_object, size);
4754 }
4755 }
4756
4757 private:
4758 void ProcessItems() {
4759 double marking_time = 0.0;
4760 {
4761 TimedScope scope(&marking_time);
4762 MarkingItem* item = nullptr;
4763 while ((item = GetItem<MarkingItem>()) != nullptr) {
4764 item->Process(this);
4765 item->MarkFinished();
4766 EmptyLocalMarkingWorklist();
4767 }
4768 EmptyMarkingWorklist();
4769 DCHECK(marking_worklist_.IsLocalEmpty())((void) 0);
4770 FlushLiveBytes();
4771 }
4772 if (FLAG_trace_minor_mc_parallel_marking) {
4773 PrintIsolate(collector_->isolate(), "marking[%p]: time=%f\n",
4774 static_cast<void*>(this), marking_time);
4775 }
4776 }
4777 void EmptyLocalMarkingWorklist() {
4778 HeapObject object;
4779 while (marking_worklist_.Pop(&object)) {
4780 const int size = visitor_.Visit(object);
4781 IncrementLiveBytes(object, size);
4782 }
4783 }
4784
4785 void EmptyMarkingWorklist() {
4786 HeapObject object;
4787 while (marking_worklist_.Pop(&object)) {
4788 const int size = visitor_.Visit(object);
4789 IncrementLiveBytes(object, size);
4790 }
4791 }
4792
4793 void IncrementLiveBytes(HeapObject object, intptr_t bytes) {
4794 local_live_bytes_[Page::FromHeapObject(object)] += bytes;
4795 }
4796
4797 void FlushLiveBytes() {
4798 for (auto pair : local_live_bytes_) {
4799 marking_state_->IncrementLiveBytes(pair.first, pair.second);
4800 }
4801 }
4802
4803 MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector_;
4804 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingWorklist::View marking_worklist_;
4805 MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkingState* marking_state_;
4806 YoungGenerationMarkingVisitor visitor_;
4807 std::unordered_map<Page*, intptr_t, Page::Hasher> local_live_bytes_;
4808};
4809
4810class PageMarkingItem : public MarkingItem {
4811 public:
4812 explicit PageMarkingItem(MemoryChunk* chunk, std::atomic<int>* global_slots)
4813 : chunk_(chunk), global_slots_(global_slots), slots_(0) {}
4814 ~PageMarkingItem() override { *global_slots_ = *global_slots_ + slots_; }
4815
4816 void Process(YoungGenerationMarkingTask* task) override {
4817 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4818 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4818
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4818
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4818
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818, "PageMarkingItem::Process"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4818 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
, "PageMarkingItem::Process", h); }
4818 "PageMarkingItem::Process")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4818 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4818
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4818
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4818
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818, "PageMarkingItem::Process"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4818 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4818
, "PageMarkingItem::Process", h); };
4819 base::MutexGuard guard(chunk_->mutex());
4820 MarkUntypedPointers(task);
4821 MarkTypedPointers(task);
4822 }
4823
4824 private:
4825 inline Heap* heap() { return chunk_->heap(); }
4826
4827 void MarkUntypedPointers(YoungGenerationMarkingTask* task) {
4828 InvalidatedSlotsFilter filter = InvalidatedSlotsFilter::OldToNew(chunk_);
4829 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::Iterate(
4830 chunk_,
4831 [this, task, &filter](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4832 if (!filter.IsValid(slot.address())) return REMOVE_SLOT;
4833 return CheckAndMarkObject(task, slot);
4834 },
4835 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4836 filter = InvalidatedSlotsFilter::OldToNew(chunk_);
4837 RememberedSetSweeping::Iterate(
4838 chunk_,
4839 [this, task, &filter](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4840 if (!filter.IsValid(slot.address())) return REMOVE_SLOT;
4841 return CheckAndMarkObject(task, slot);
4842 },
4843 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4844 }
4845
4846 void MarkTypedPointers(YoungGenerationMarkingTask* task) {
4847 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::IterateTyped(
4848 chunk_, [=](SlotType slot_type, Address slot) {
4849 return UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
4850 heap(), slot_type, slot, [this, task](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4851 return CheckAndMarkObject(task, slot);
4852 });
4853 });
4854 }
4855
4856 template <typename TSlot>
4857 V8_INLINEinline __attribute__((always_inline)) SlotCallbackResult
4858 CheckAndMarkObject(YoungGenerationMarkingTask* task, TSlot slot) {
4859 static_assert(
4860 std::is_same<TSlot, FullMaybeObjectSlot>::value ||
4861 std::is_same<TSlot, MaybeObjectSlot>::value,
4862 "Only FullMaybeObjectSlot and MaybeObjectSlot are expected here");
4863 MaybeObject object = *slot;
4864 if (Heap::InYoungGeneration(object)) {
4865 // Marking happens before flipping the young generation, so the object
4866 // has to be in a to page.
4867 DCHECK(Heap::InToPage(object))((void) 0);
4868 HeapObject heap_object;
4869 bool success = object.GetHeapObject(&heap_object);
4870 USE(success)do { ::v8::base::Use unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro[]{success
}; (void)unused_tmp_array_for_use_macro; } while (false);
4871 DCHECK(success)((void) 0);
4872 task->MarkObject(heap_object);
4873 slots_++;
4874 return KEEP_SLOT;
4875 }
4876 return REMOVE_SLOT;
4877 }
4878
4879 MemoryChunk* chunk_;
4880 std::atomic<int>* global_slots_;
4881 int slots_;
4882};
4883
4884void MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkRootSetInParallel(
4885 RootMarkingVisitor* root_visitor) {
4886 std::atomic<int> slots;
4887 {
4888 ItemParallelJob job(isolate()->cancelable_task_manager(),
4889 &page_parallel_job_semaphore_);
4890
4891 // Seed the root set (roots + old->new set).
4892 {
4893 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK_SEED)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_SEED); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4893
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4893
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4893
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4893
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4893
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4893, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4894 isolate()->global_handles()->IdentifyWeakUnmodifiedObjects(
4895 &JSObject::IsUnmodifiedApiObject);
4896 // MinorMC treats all weak roots except for global handles as strong.
4897 // That is why we don't set skip_weak = true here and instead visit
4898 // global handles separately.
4899 heap()->IterateRoots(
4900 root_visitor, base::EnumSet<SkipRoot>{SkipRoot::kExternalStringTable,
4901 SkipRoot::kGlobalHandles,
4902 SkipRoot::kOldGeneration});
4903 isolate()->global_handles()->IterateYoungStrongAndDependentRoots(
4904 root_visitor);
4905 // Create items for each page.
4906 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::IterateMemoryChunks(
4907 heap(), [&job, &slots](MemoryChunk* chunk) {
4908 job.AddItem(new PageMarkingItem(chunk, &slots));
4909 });
4910 }
4911
4912 // Add tasks and run in parallel.
4913 {
4914 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK_ROOTS)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_ROOTS); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4914
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4914
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4914
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4914
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4914
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4914, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4915 const int new_space_pages =
4916 static_cast<int>(heap()->new_space()->Capacity()) / Page::kPageSize;
4917 const int num_tasks = NumberOfParallelMarkingTasks(new_space_pages);
4918 for (int i = 0; i < num_tasks; i++) {
4919 job.AddTask(
4920 new YoungGenerationMarkingTask(isolate(), this, worklist(), i));
4921 }
4922 job.Run();
4923 DCHECK(worklist()->IsEmpty())((void) 0);
4924 }
4925 }
4926 old_to_new_slots_ = slots;
4927}
4928
4929void MinorMarkCompactCollector::MarkLiveObjects() {
4930 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->tracer
(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4930
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4930
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4930
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4930
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4930
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4930, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4931
4932 PostponeInterruptsScope postpone(isolate());
4933
4934 RootMarkingVisitor root_visitor(this);
4935
4936 MarkRootSetInParallel(&root_visitor);
4937
4938 // Mark rest on the main thread.
4939 {
4940 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK_WEAK)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_WEAK); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic4940
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4940
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4940
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4940
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4940
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4940, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4941 DrainMarkingWorklist();
4942 }
4943
4944 {
4945 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_MARK_GLOBAL_HANDLES)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_MARK_GLOBAL_HANDLES); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic4945 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4945
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic4945
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer4945
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer4945
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled4945, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
4946 isolate()->global_handles()->MarkYoungWeakDeadObjectsPending(
4947 &IsUnmarkedObjectForYoungGeneration);
4948 isolate()->global_handles()->IterateYoungWeakDeadObjectsForFinalizers(
4949 &root_visitor);
4950 isolate()->global_handles()->IterateYoungWeakObjectsForPhantomHandles(
4951 &root_visitor, &IsUnmarkedObjectForYoungGeneration);
4952 DrainMarkingWorklist();
4953 }
4954
4955 if (FLAG_minor_mc_trace_fragmentation) {
4956 TraceFragmentation();
4957 }
4958}
4959
4960void MinorMarkCompactCollector::DrainMarkingWorklist() {
4961 MarkingWorklist::View marking_worklist(worklist(), kMainMarker);
4962 HeapObject object;
4963 while (marking_worklist.Pop(&object)) {
4964 DCHECK(!object.IsFreeSpaceOrFiller())((void) 0);
4965 DCHECK(object.IsHeapObject())((void) 0);
4966 DCHECK(heap()->Contains(object))((void) 0);
4967 DCHECK(non_atomic_marking_state()->IsGrey(object))((void) 0);
4968 main_marking_visitor()->Visit(object);
4969 }
4970 DCHECK(marking_worklist.IsLocalEmpty())((void) 0);
4971}
4972
4973void MinorMarkCompactCollector::TraceFragmentation() {
4974 NewSpace* new_space = heap()->new_space();
4975 const std::array<size_t, 4> free_size_class_limits = {0, 1024, 2048, 4096};
4976 size_t free_bytes_of_class[free_size_class_limits.size()] = {0};
4977 size_t live_bytes = 0;
4978 size_t allocatable_bytes = 0;
4979 for (Page* p :
4980 PageRange(new_space->first_allocatable_address(), new_space->top())) {
4981 Address free_start = p->area_start();
4982 for (auto object_and_size : LiveObjectRange<kGreyObjects>(
4983 p, non_atomic_marking_state()->bitmap(p))) {
4984 HeapObject const object = object_and_size.first;
4985 Address free_end = object.address();
4986 if (free_end != free_start) {
4987 size_t free_bytes = free_end - free_start;
4988 int free_bytes_index = 0;
4989 for (auto free_size_class_limit : free_size_class_limits) {
4990 if (free_bytes >= free_size_class_limit) {
4991 free_bytes_of_class[free_bytes_index] += free_bytes;
4992 }
4993 free_bytes_index++;
4994 }
4995 }
4996 Map map = object.synchronized_map();
4997 int size = object.SizeFromMap(map);
4998 live_bytes += size;
4999 free_start = free_end + size;
5000 }
5001 size_t area_end =
5002 p->Contains(new_space->top()) ? new_space->top() : p->area_end();
5003 if (free_start != area_end) {
5004 size_t free_bytes = area_end - free_start;
5005 int free_bytes_index = 0;
5006 for (auto free_size_class_limit : free_size_class_limits) {
5007 if (free_bytes >= free_size_class_limit) {
5008 free_bytes_of_class[free_bytes_index] += free_bytes;
5009 }
5010 free_bytes_index++;
5011 }
5012 }
5013 allocatable_bytes += area_end - p->area_start();
5014 CHECK_EQ(allocatable_bytes, live_bytes + free_bytes_of_class[0])do { bool _cmp = ::v8::base::CmpEQImpl< typename ::v8::base
::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(allocatable_bytes)>::type,
typename ::v8::base::pass_value_or_ref<decltype(live_bytes
+ free_bytes_of_class[0])>::type>((allocatable_bytes),
(live_bytes + free_bytes_of_class[0])); do { if ((__builtin_expect
(!!(!(_cmp)), 0))) { V8_Fatal("Check failed: %s.", "allocatable_bytes"
" " "==" " " "live_bytes + free_bytes_of_class[0]"); } } while
(false); } while (false);
5015 }
5016 PrintIsolate(
5017 isolate(),
5018 "Minor Mark-Compact Fragmentation: allocatable_bytes=%zu live_bytes=%zu "
5019 "free_bytes=%zu free_bytes_1K=%zu free_bytes_2K=%zu free_bytes_4K=%zu\n",
5020 allocatable_bytes, live_bytes, free_bytes_of_class[0],
5021 free_bytes_of_class[1], free_bytes_of_class[2], free_bytes_of_class[3]);
5022}
5023
5024void MinorMarkCompactCollector::Evacuate() {
5025 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap()->
tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic5025
= 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5025
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5025
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5025
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5025
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5025, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5026 base::MutexGuard guard(heap()->relocation_mutex());
5027
5028 {
5029 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_PROLOGUE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_PROLOGUE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(
heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic5029 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5029
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5029
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5029
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5029
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5029, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5030 EvacuatePrologue();
5031 }
5032
5033 {
5034 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_COPY)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_COPY); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(heap
()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic5034 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5034
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5034
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5034
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5034
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5034, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5035 EvacuatePagesInParallel();
5036 }
5037
5038 UpdatePointersAfterEvacuation();
5039
5040 {
5041 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_REBALANCE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_REBALANCE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope
(heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic5041 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5041
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5041
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5041
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5041
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5041, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5042 if (!heap()->new_space()->Rebalance()) {
5043 heap()->FatalProcessOutOfMemory("NewSpace::Rebalance");
5044 }
5045 }
5046
5047 {
5048 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_CLEAN_UP)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_CLEAN_UP); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(
heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic5048 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5048
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5048
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5048
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5048
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5048, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5049 for (Page* p : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
5050 if (p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION) ||
5051 p->IsFlagSet(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION)) {
5052 p->ClearFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_NEW_PROMOTION);
5053 p->ClearFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
5054 p->SetFlag(Page::SWEEP_TO_ITERATE);
5055 sweep_to_iterate_pages_.push_back(p);
5056 }
5057 }
5058 new_space_evacuation_pages_.clear();
5059 }
5060
5061 {
5062 TRACE_GC(heap()->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_EPILOGUE)GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId gc_tracer_scope_id(GCTracer::Scope::
MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_EPILOGUE); GCTracer::Scope gc_tracer_scope(
heap()->tracer(), gc_tracer_scope_id); static v8::base::AtomicWord
trace_event_unique_atomic5062 = 0; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5062
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("devtools.timeline," "disabled-by-default-"
"v8.gc"); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5062
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5062
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062, GCTracer::Scope
::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope
, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId,
(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5062
.Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5062, GCTracer
::Scope::Name(gc_tracer_scope_id), h); };
5063 EvacuateEpilogue();
5064 }
5065}
5066
5067namespace {
5068
5069class YoungGenerationEvacuator : public Evacuator {
5070 public:
5071 explicit YoungGenerationEvacuator(MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector)
5072 : Evacuator(collector->heap(), &record_visitor_, &local_allocator_,
5073 false),
5074 record_visitor_(collector->heap()->mark_compact_collector()),
5075 local_allocator_(heap_,
5076 LocalSpaceKind::kCompactionSpaceForMinorMarkCompact),
5077 collector_(collector) {}
5078
5079 GCTracer::BackgroundScope::ScopeId GetBackgroundTracingScope() override {
5080 return GCTracer::BackgroundScope::MINOR_MC_BACKGROUND_EVACUATE_COPY;
5081 }
5082
5083 GCTracer::Scope::ScopeId GetTracingScope() override {
5084 return GCTracer::Scope::MINOR_MC_EVACUATE_COPY_PARALLEL;
5085 }
5086
5087 protected:
5088 void RawEvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk, intptr_t* live_bytes) override;
5089
5090 YoungGenerationRecordMigratedSlotVisitor record_visitor_;
5091 EvacuationAllocator local_allocator_;
5092 MinorMarkCompactCollector* collector_;
5093};
5094
5095void YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage(MemoryChunk* chunk,
5096 intptr_t* live_bytes) {
5097 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic5098 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5098
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5098
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5098
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098, "YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5098 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
, "YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage", h); }
5098 "YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage")static v8::base::AtomicWord trace_event_unique_atomic5098 = 0
; const uint8_t* trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
; trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098 = reinterpret_cast
<const uint8_t*>(v8::base::Relaxed_Load(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5098
))); if (!trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098) { trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
= v8::internal::tracing::TraceEventHelper::GetTracingController
() ->GetCategoryGroupEnabled("disabled-by-default-" "v8.gc"
); v8::base::Relaxed_Store(&(trace_event_unique_atomic5098
), (reinterpret_cast<v8::base::AtomicWord>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
))); };; v8::internal::tracing::ScopedTracer trace_event_unique_tracer5098
; if (v8::base::Relaxed_Load(reinterpret_cast<const v8::base
::Atomic8*>( trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
)) & (kEnabledForRecording_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags | kEnabledForEventCallback_CategoryGroupEnabledFlags
)) { uint64_t h = v8::internal::tracing::AddTraceEvent( ('X')
, trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098, "YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage"
, v8::internal::tracing::kGlobalScope, v8::internal::tracing::
kNoId, v8::internal::tracing::kNoId, (static_cast<unsigned
int>(0))); trace_event_unique_tracer5098 .Initialize(trace_event_unique_category_group_enabled5098
, "YoungGenerationEvacuator::RawEvacuatePage", h); };
5099 MinorMarkCompactCollector::NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state =
5100 collector_->non_atomic_marking_state();
5101 *live_bytes = marking_state->live_bytes(chunk);
5102 switch (ComputeEvacuationMode(chunk)) {
5103 case kObjectsNewToOld:
5104 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitGreyObjectsNoFail(
5105 chunk, marking_state, &new_space_visitor_,
5106 LiveObjectVisitor::kClearMarkbits);
5107 break;
5108 case kPageNewToOld:
5109 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitGreyObjectsNoFail(
5110 chunk, marking_state, &new_to_old_page_visitor_,
5111 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
5112 new_to_old_page_visitor_.account_moved_bytes(
5113 marking_state->live_bytes(chunk));
5114 if (!chunk->IsLargePage()) {
5115 if (heap()->ShouldZapGarbage()) {
5116 collector_->MakeIterable(static_cast<Page*>(chunk),
5117 MarkingTreatmentMode::KEEP, ZAP_FREE_SPACE);
5118 } else if (heap()->incremental_marking()->IsMarking()) {
5119 // When incremental marking is on, we need to clear the mark bits of
5120 // the full collector. We cannot yet discard the young generation mark
5121 // bits as they are still relevant for pointers updating.
5122 collector_->MakeIterable(static_cast<Page*>(chunk),
5123 MarkingTreatmentMode::KEEP,
5124 IGNORE_FREE_SPACE);
5125 }
5126 }
5127 break;
5128 case kPageNewToNew:
5129 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitGreyObjectsNoFail(
5130 chunk, marking_state, &new_to_new_page_visitor_,
5131 LiveObjectVisitor::kKeepMarking);
5132 new_to_new_page_visitor_.account_moved_bytes(
5133 marking_state->live_bytes(chunk));
5134 DCHECK(!chunk->IsLargePage())((void) 0);
5135 if (heap()->ShouldZapGarbage()) {
5136 collector_->MakeIterable(static_cast<Page*>(chunk),
5137 MarkingTreatmentMode::KEEP, ZAP_FREE_SPACE);
5138 } else if (heap()->incremental_marking()->IsMarking()) {
5139 // When incremental marking is on, we need to clear the mark bits of
5140 // the full collector. We cannot yet discard the young generation mark
5141 // bits as they are still relevant for pointers updating.
5142 collector_->MakeIterable(static_cast<Page*>(chunk),
5143 MarkingTreatmentMode::KEEP, IGNORE_FREE_SPACE);
5144 }
5145 break;
5146 case kObjectsOldToOld:
5147 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
5148 }
5149}
5150
5151} // namespace
5152
5153void MinorMarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel() {
5154 ItemParallelJob evacuation_job(isolate()->cancelable_task_manager(),
5155 &page_parallel_job_semaphore_);
5156 intptr_t live_bytes = 0;
5157
5158 for (Page* page : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
5159 intptr_t live_bytes_on_page = non_atomic_marking_state()->live_bytes(page);
5160 if (live_bytes_on_page == 0) continue;
5161 live_bytes += live_bytes_on_page;
5162 if (ShouldMovePage(page, live_bytes_on_page, false)) {
5163 if (page->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::NEW_SPACE_BELOW_AGE_MARK)) {
5164 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<NEW_TO_OLD>::Move(page);
5165 } else {
5166 EvacuateNewSpacePageVisitor<NEW_TO_NEW>::Move(page);
5167 }
5168 }
5169 evacuation_job.AddItem(new EvacuationItem(page));
5170 }
5171
5172 // Promote young generation large objects.
5173 for (auto it = heap()->new_lo_space()->begin();
5174 it != heap()->new_lo_space()->end();) {
5175 LargePage* current = *it;
5176 it++;
5177 HeapObject object = current->GetObject();
5178 DCHECK(!non_atomic_marking_state_.IsBlack(object))((void) 0);
5179 if (non_atomic_marking_state_.IsGrey(object)) {
5180 heap_->lo_space()->PromoteNewLargeObject(current);
5181 current->SetFlag(Page::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
5182 evacuation_job.AddItem(new EvacuationItem(current));
5183 }
5184 }
5185 if (evacuation_job.NumberOfItems() == 0) return;
5186
5187 YoungGenerationMigrationObserver observer(heap(),
5188 heap()->mark_compact_collector());
5189 CreateAndExecuteEvacuationTasks<YoungGenerationEvacuator>(
5190 this, &evacuation_job, &observer, live_bytes);
5191}
5192
5193#endif // ENABLE_MINOR_MC
5194
5195} // namespace internal
5196} // namespace v8
